Twenty-five-year-old Josué was only able to study until 7th grade in elementary school. He is in a relationship and he has two children, but they aren't in school yet. His partner is a stay-at-home mom, and his partner and children are the only ones who rely on Josué.

Josué is a farmer, and he has 10 years of experience working with corn. When it isn't planting season, he makes a living dealing livestock. This year, just as in previous years, he is requesting a loan to buy livestock, which will be fattened and then sold. He will do this work until the next planting season arrives. As in past years, he hopes the investment turns out for him, to use the money earned from sales to farm.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Satenik

texts.en:
The nice woman in the photo is Satenik from Qarahunj village. Satenik lives with her husband, mother-in-law who is elderly and retired, and three children. 
 
Satenik and her family are involved in an agribusiness. They also run a small family business: they have a bakery where Armenian national bread lavash is made. The bakery is successful and has many customers who order their daily bread from there. The farm is also an important source of income for Satenik and her family. It includes livestock of cows, calves, pig and hens. They also cultivate haricot and potato. Because the farm needs financial investment to be done on it, Satenik has applied for this loan. She asks lenders to help her to purchase forage for the livestock, to rent an agro machine for collecting the harvest and to buy fuel. 

This hardworking and nice woman and her whole family hope for the support.

loans.use: to purchase forage for the livestock, to rent an agro machine for collecting the harvest and to buy fuel

loans.name: Walter Alexander

texts.es:
Walter, de 41 años de edad, estudió hasta tercer año de bachillerato, está acompañado desde hace 7 años, su esposa se dedica a cuidar a sus 2 hijos.

Walter, tiene 17 años de trabajar como agente de la policía nacional civil, su lugar de trabajo está ubicado a 22 kilómetros de distancia, viaja en bus y trabaja 4 días seguidos y tiene derecho a 4 días de descanso.

El crédito que está solicitando es para hacerle remodelaciones a su vivienda, ya que actualmente se encuentra en malas condiciones.
Walter sueña con, apoyar a sus hijos para que estudien y puedan ser profesionales.
texts.en:
Walter is 41 years old and completed three years of high school. He has been married for 7 years. His wife takes care of the two children. Walter has worked as an agent of the civil national police for 17 years. His place of work is located 22 kilometers from his home. He travels by bus and works 4 consecutive days then 4 days of rest.

The loan he seeks is to do renovations on his home, as today it is in poor condition. Walter dreams about supporting his children through school so that they can be professionals.

loans.use: to do renovations on his home.

loans.name: Ana Alicia

texts.es:
Ana, de 49 años de edad, solo estudió hasta sexto grado, está casada y junto a su esposo tienen 3 hijos, todos están acompañados.- Desde muy pequeña se dedico al los oficios domésticos junto a su madre.

Ana, tiene tres años de trabajar vendiendo en un cafetin, ya tiene sus clientes y sobre todo ya adquirió la experiencia para administrar el negocio, que es de donde obtiene ingresos para poder salir adelante.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar mercadería para el negocio y también para remodelar su cafetin, ya que se le esta deteriorando y necesita ampliarlo mas, para poder surtir con mas productos y estar en un espacio mas cómodo. 

Ana, desea tener más variedad de productos en su cafetin para obtener mejores ingresos para salir adelante cada día que pasa.
texts.en:
Ana, who is 49 years old, only went to school through sixth grade. She is married, and she and her husband have three children, all of whom are married. Since she was very young, she worked at domestic tasks along with her mother.

For three years, Ana's work has been selling [items] in a snack bar. She already has customers, and above all, she has already acquired the experience to manage the business, which is where she obtains income in order to be able to get ahead.

She needs the loan to purchase merchandise for the business and also to remodel her snack bar, since it is deteriorating and she needs to expand it more in order to be able to stock it with more products and be in a more comfortable space.

Ana wants to have more variety of products in her snack bar in order to obtain better income so that she can get ahead with each passing day.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her business

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.en:
Alfredo operates a motorcycle transport service locally know as "habal-habal"- a motorcycle with extended seat to accommodate several passengers in a row.  He transport passengers from one place to remote areas. He is married with five children. His oldest child is 21 while the youngest is 8. Aside from motorcycle transport, he also engages in rice farming. He grows and sells rice.

He is asking for a loan to buy farming materials like fertilizers, rice seedlings and pesticide. These will help improve his farming livelihood. They will create higher yield and thus create higher earnings.

In the future, Alfredo dreams to expand his business to make it successful so he can support the needs of his growing children.

loans.use: to buy farming materials like fertilizers, rice seedlings and pesticide

loans.name: Zulaykho

texts.en:
Zulaykho is 29 years old. She is married and has a child. Zulaykho has a ‘golden hands’. She has been a seamstress for many years. Zulaykho sews a variety of women's and children's clothes. She has developed her business little by little over the years. 

Zulaykho always tries for the well-being of her family. She is going to repair her kitchen with modern planning and in this way offer comfortable living conditions to her family. She is asking for a loan of 2,500 Somoni to buy building materials such as cement, wood, etc. for repairing her kitchen. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: To buy building materials such as cement, wood, etc. for repairing her kitchen

loans.name: Mae

texts.en:
Mae is 46 years old, married with  two children aged 21 and 15. She works very hard to provide for her family.

Mae runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through CEVI to purchase additional stock to sell like canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, noodles, bath soap and detergent, seasonings and shampoo.

Mae has been in this business for 20 years.

In the future, Mae would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, noodles, bath soap and detergent, seasonings and shampoo

loans.name: Nateete Central Market Group

texts.en:
Swaleh is 30 years old, married, and has one child. He is a first-time borrower from UGAFODE Microfinance Ltd. He has borrowed a loan of UGX. 500,000. He does poultry farming in a market on the city outskirts. The purpose of the loan is to buy poultry chicks that will be ready for sale during Christmas which will increase his sales and income since many people will be buying for the season. His customers are well wishers and his neighbors in the area. 

Swaleh is aggressive, hard-working and also kind to his customers and neighbors. He hopes to work very had so as to be able to repay the loan and be able to get another loan. He is grateful to the institution for the support given to all low income earners like him so they can access finances.

loans.use: To buy poultry chicks

loans.name: Bertha Ligia

texts.es:
Bertha se dedica a la actividad de la confección desde hace aproximadamente 15 años, gracias a esto ha podido contribuir, junto con sus hijos al sostenimiento de los gastos de su hogar. 

Bertha es madre de 6 hijos a quienes siempre les ha querido ofrecer todo lo necesario, debido a que su esposo falleció, se vio obligada a tomar las riendas de su hogar y fue asi com decidió montar un taller donde ofrece el servicio de confección a terceros.  
Gracias a la buena calidad de las prendas que fabrica, ha podido captar una muy buena clientela, lo que le ha permitido tener muy buenas ventas. 

Bertha actualmente quiere aumentar la capacidad de producción de su taller con el ánimo de poder pagar los estudios universitarios de sus hijos, es por esto que aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de una máquina plana.

Bertha espera que de esta manera pueda cumplir su sueño de que sus hijos accedan a una educación universitaria, además, de poder mejorarle la calidad de vida a su familia. 

Bertha espera que su taller aumente las ventas considerablemente y en un futuro hacerlo crecer y poder generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas. 

Ayuda con un préstamo el taller de Bertha!
texts.en:
Bertha has been working in the business of sewing for about 15 years. Thanks to this, along with her children, she has been able to contribute to supporting the household expenses.

Bertha is the mother of 6 children for whom she has always wanted to provide them with everything necessary. Because her husband died she had to take charge of the house and thus she decided to open the workshop where she offers her sewing services to third parties. Thanks to the good quality of clothing she produces she has been able to capture a good clientele, which allows her to have good sales.

Bertha now wants to increase her production capacity in her workshop with the goal of being able to pay the university studies of her children. For this reason she hopes to get a loan which will give her the possibility to buy a lock stitch sewing machine. Bertha hopes that by doing this she can fulfill her dream of her children getting university education and also to improve the quality of living of her family. Bertha hopes that her workshop increases it's sales remarkably and in the future continues to grow and be able to generate employment for people more needy than her. Help Bertha's workshop with a loan.

loans.use: to buy a lock-stitch sewing machine.

loans.name: Deiby Alexander

texts.es:
Deiby es un hombre con todas las pilas puestas para enfrentar el mundo y tener una vida plena gracias a sus esfuerzos.
Tiene un almacén en el que vende productos de papelería como útiles escolares, elementos para decoración, entre otros. Inicio el negocio hace 2 años y a pesar de su poco tiempo en funcionamiento ha tenido buena acogida en el sector.
El desea ampliar su oferta de productos y mejorar sus ventas inyectándole capital a su empresa, es por esta razón que solicita un crédito para darse la oportunidad de ser mas prospero. 
El dinero será invertido en la compra de mercancía con la que actualmente no cuenta como juguetería y cosméticos.
Tiene grandes esperanzas en su negocio y piensa que su futuro puede mejorar considerablemente gracias al apoyo de entidades como Interactuar que hacen lo posible para que las personas puedan soñar con una vida mejor y más estable.

Con tu ayuda Deiby podrá salir adelante!
texts.en:
Deiby is a man ready to face the world and have a full life as a result of his efforts.
He has a general store in which he sells stationary good such as school supplies, decoration products, among other things. He started the business two years ago and despite the short time he has been in business he has had a good welcome in the area.
He wishes to increase the products he has to offer and improve his sales by injecting capital into his business, this is why he is asking for a loan to give him the opportunity to be more prosperous.
The money will be invested in buying merchandise that he does not currently have such as toys and makeup.
He has great hopes for his business and he thinks that his future could considerably improve hanks to the support of entities such as Interactuar which make it possible for people to dream of a better and more stable life. 
With your help, Deiby can get ahead!

loans.use: to buy merchandise that he does not currently have such as toys and makeup.

loans.name: Gabriela

texts.en: Gabriela is a school teacher and she has been working and living at El Alto for the last three years. She is married and her husband is an independent taxi driver. Gabriela has two children; the oldest is six years old and the other one is three.  Gabriela and her husband need a loan to fix the floor of their home. (They are living in the house of Gabriela s father.) The family wants to live better so Gabriela and her husband will do anything to repay the loan on time. Gabriela will appreciate your help a lot.

loans.use: to fix the floor of their home

loans.name: Edelmira

texts.es: Edelmira tiene 40 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su esposo y sus tres hijos de 18 años, 14 años y 10 años de edad. Edelmira es una gran mujer quien hace todo lo que este en sus manos para dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida. Con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones habitacionales ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena, grava y ventanas dado que desea encementar el piso del área de cocina y además desea cambiar las ventanas de su casa.
texts.en:
Edelmira is 40 years old. She lives in her own house along with her husband and her three children, whose ages are 18, 14, and 10. Edelmira is a great woman who does everything in her power to give her family better living conditions. 

With a desire to improve her housing conditions, she has decided to request a loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of cement, sand, gravel, and windows, because she would like to put a cement floor in her kitchen as well as change the windows in her house.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, and windows to put a cement floor in her kitchen and change the windows in her house.

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es: Luis de 19 años de edad es un hombre trabajador que se gana la vida comprando y vendiendo gaseosas y jugos en las tiendas del municipio y sus alrededores, lo que le permite salir adelante. Él habita en vivienda propia y aunque vive solo tiene una hija de 2 meses de edad que es su mayor motivo para salir adelante y apoyarla. Luis desea reparar su vehículo que es su herramienta de trabajo ya que es en el que realiza las visitas para ofrecer sus productos y llevar los mismos a las tiendas, además desea comprar una mayor cantidad de productos para obtener mejores ingresos económicos, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en repuestos para el vehículo y gaseosas por mayoreo.
texts.en: Luis is 19 years old and a hard-working man who earns a living buying and selling soda pop and juices in stores in the municipality and its environs, which enables him to get ahead. He lives in his own home and even though he lives alone he has a 2 month old daughter who is his primary motive to be successful and to support her. Luis wishes to repair his vehicle that is his work tool as it is what he uses for his visits to sell his products and transport them to the stores. In addition he wants to buy a large quantity of products in order to obtain better income, so he is seeking a loan from FUSAI to invest in parts for his vehicle and soda pop at wholesale.

loans.use: to invest in parts for his vehicle and soda pop at wholesale.

loans.name: Gs. Las Excelencias 1 Group

texts.en:
Maritza is the coordinator of her group, GS. Las Excelencias (The Excellencies). This solidarity group is located in San Pedro de Macoris, a city famous for baseball players and the sugar cane industry, where these businesswomen run their activities in their community and others nearby.

Maritza makes her home there in a simple structure with her two children. She is excited to be taking her fourth loan with Esperanza, after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business by buying food to resell in her colmado, a grocery store where she sells rice, beans, cooking oil, and different groceries. With this loan she will increase her inventory.

The other members, also women, run different businesses like a cafeteria and underwear and clothing sales. Maritza will use her profits to improve her home and invest in her business. She thanks you all for your support.

loans.use: To buy rice, beans, flour, canned food, grains, etc.

loans.name: Deysi Guadalupe

texts.es: Deysi tiene 38 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 17 años y 15 años de edad. Deysi se dedica a la venta de antojitos típicos desde hace mucho tiempo y es así como se gana la vida y junto a su compañero de vida mantienen a sus hijos. Deysi desea invertir en la ampliación de su vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de arena, cemento, hierro, lámina, ladrillo, etc. De esta forma espera dar a su familia condiciones más adecuadas para su desarrollo.
texts.en:
Deysi is 38 years old and lives in her own house with her husband and their two children aged 17 and 15. She has earned her living selling traditional snacks for many years. In this way she helps her husband support their children. 

Deysi now wishes to extend the house so she is seeking a loan from FUSAI to buy sand, cement, iron, laminated sheets, bricks etc. She hopes that this will result in better living conditions for her family.

loans.use: buy sand, cement, iron, laminated sheets, bricks etc. to build a new room on the house

loans.name: Kenia Jeanneth

texts.es:
La señora Kenia es una mujer emprendedora y dedicada al comercio su fuente principal de ingresos provienen de su negocio que es una pulpería, su negocio lo tiene desde hace 5 años y sus principales clientes son vecinos de su comunidad y alrededores.
Doña Kenia solicita el apoyo del préstamo para realizar un mejor acondicionamiento de la bodega donde tiene su negocio y comprar azúcar, arroz, frijoles, harina, huevos, etc. para darle un mejor atención a sus clientes.
Doña Kenia sueña con poder ampliar su negocio y convertirlo en un mercadito de abastos para las zonas aledañas y así poder mejorar su fuente de ingresos.

Danlí, Honduras -  Noviembre 2014
texts.en:
Kenia is an enterprising woman who works in business as her main source of income. She has had a corner store for five years. Her main clients are neighbours.
Kenia is requesting a loan to fix up her store and to buy sugar, rice, beans, flour, eggs, etc in order to better serve her customers.
Kenia dreams of being able to expand her business and convert it into a small market with groceries for the nearby zones. This would improve her income.

Danlí, Honduras -  November 2014

loans.use: to purchase sugar, rice, beans, flour, eggs, etc, and to fix up her store.

loans.name: Leonita

texts.en:
Leonita is a 33-year-old married mother of four children, all of whom are in school. She has operated a pig-fattening business in the Philippines for four years now.

The recipient of seven previous loans from NWTF, Leonita has requested a PHP 15000 loan to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is a 39-year-old married mother of three children, two of whom are currently in school. Involved in a pig-fattening business in the Philippines for five years, she has received three previous loans from NWTF to sustain it.

Teresita is now requesting a new loan for PHP 14000 to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs. In the future, she would like to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy feeds and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Samvel

texts.en:
Samvel lives with his big, nice family in Ijevan city in the Tavush region. Samvel has no higher education, but he is such a hard worker that he is simultaneously engaged in farming, beekeeping, and car repairing and he tries to cover his big family’s numerous needs. On his farm, Samvel has cows, calves, and piglets. He has loyal customers and every week they visit him to purchase beef and pork. His skills in bee keeping are also good, since his bees make very tasty and healing honey, which Samvel sells to his regular customers each season. Samvel is also good with machines and he has managed a car-repairing service for several years in a garage near his house. 

Samvel is married and he has three children. His elder son and daughter are students and his smallest son is school-aged. Samvel’s wife is unemployed and she both helps him in farming and takes care of their children and house.

Samvel will be thankful to receive this loan in the amount of 300,000 Armenian drams in order to buy a lot of fodder for his cattle and to repair some of the boxes for his bees.

loans.use: to buy a lot of fodder for his cattle and to repair some of the boxes for his bees

loans.name: Narine

texts.en:
Narine lives in the city of Kapan. Because she got married very early, she is already a mother of three children (two sons and a daughter). Narine has never worked anywhere outside of the farming and land cultivation that she does, which she used to manage with the help of her husband. She now does nearly everything alone because her husband is employed. On her plot of land she cultivates potato, cucumber, cabbage, beans and greens. She also has a nice orchard with apple, cherry and pear trees. All of the harvest that she gathers from her land she sells during the week at the city's wholesale market mainly to resellers. 

Narine says that she wants to fence her orchard because it used to be a small one, but during the years she has enlarged it. She wants to fence it and she needs to buy a lot of fencing materials.

loans.use: to buy a lot of fencing materials to fence her orchard

loans.name: Yurik

texts.en:
Yurik is happy to have one more deal with Kiva after so many years. His first deal was greatly profitable for his business and he hopes that this one will also be successful. Yurik lives in Kapan city. He is married and now lives with his wife. Their children (son and daughter) live and work in Yerevan city. Yurik lives with his wife and still runs his business. He still cooperates with a very famous company of ice cream, frozen fruits, vegetables and juices. He distributes these products to all the markets in his region. 

For many years he has taken orders from markets and fulfills all of them during the week. He uses all of his income to improve his family’s life. This New Year’s period is very active for his business, since the celebration of holidays mean great shopping activities, and he manages to have a lot of orders. As previously, he asks for this Kiva loan in order to enlarge and refresh all his products’ assortment, so all his partners will be satisfied with his services.

loans.use: to enlarge and refresh all his products’ assortment, so all his partners will be satisfied with his services

loans.name: Evelyn Marisol

texts.es:
Evelyn, vende ropa usada y nueva, esta actividad la aprendió por medio de amistades, hoy ya cuenta con su propio negocio bien surtido con nuevos estilos de prendas de vestir, ya tiene  5 años de poseer negocio, su tiempo lo distribuye entre sus hijos y su negocio, vive con sus hijos.
Ella con el préstamo comprara camisas, faldas, pantalones, ropa interior, etc., renovara su inventario para poder competir en esta temporada navideña y generar mejores ingresos, de esta manera cumplirá con el pago de su deuda y su estilo de vida será más confortable.
Sus aspiraciones son incorporar nuevos productos a su negocio, dar un mejor futuro a sus hijos y ampliar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Evelyn sells used and new clothing. She learned this activity through friends.  Today, she has her own business, supplied with new styles of garments.  She has had the business for five years.  She divides her time between her children and her business.  She lives with her children.

With the loan, she will buy shirts, skirts, pants, underwear, etc.  She will update her inventory in order to be able to compete during this Christmas season and generate better income.  That way, she will fulfill the payments for her debt, and her lifestyle will be more comfortable.

Her aspirations are to incorporate new products into her business, to give her children a better future, and to expand her home.

loans.use: to buy shirts, skirts, pants, underwear, etc., to update her inventory to be able to compete during this Christmas season and generate better income.

loans.name: Arpine

texts.en:
Arpine is a young farmer from Aruj village in the Aragatsotn region. She lives with her husband (in the photo) and little daughter. 

To take care of her family’s needs, Arpine is engaged in an agribusiness. With the help of her husband, she is involved in livestock breeding. They keep a cow, calves and hens and realize the agriculture in the local market. The latter is the main source of the family’s income. To continue her agribusiness in a sustainable way, Arpine needs to make some investments. A loan of USD 1,500 will be a huge support for this young hardworking woman and her family and will enable her to purchase six piglets and forage for feeding the livestock.
  
As this is Arpine’s first loan, it has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative of Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who didn’t have access to credit products before, because they have no credit history. Arpine and her family highly rely on the good will of the lenders and will appreciate their support in collecting the needed amount of the loan to maintain and develop their agribusiness.

loans.use: to purchase 6 piglets and forage for feeding the livestock

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es:
Miguel, de 65 años de edad, está acompañado y junto a su esposa procrearon cuatro hijos, todos están acompañados, desde pequeño trabajo junto a su padre haciendo oficios varios, 

Miguel, tiene una tienda, de donde obtiene ingresos para poder comprar lo que ellos necesitan  en su diario vivir.- Tiene siete años de tener tienda, ha adquirido experiencia para administrarla.

El crédito lo necesita para comprar más productos para la tienda, ya que es época navideña y de fin de año y existe bastante demanda de algunos productos que solo para esta temporada se venden, es por eso que quiere aprovechar para obtener buenas ganancias.  

Miguel, desea ampliar más su tienda, tener muchos clientes.
texts.en:
Miguel, age 65, is in a common-law marriage, and along with his partner he has four children, all of whom are in relationships.  When he was young, he worked alongside his father doing various tasks.

Miguel has a store, from which he gains income to be able to purchase what they need in their daily lives.  He has had the store for seven years, and has gained experience in administering it.

He needs the loan to buy more products for the store, since it is the Christmas season and the end of the year, and there is a great demand for some products that are only sold this time of year.  Therefore, he wants to make the most of it to get a good profit.

Miguel wants to expand his store and have a lot of customers.

loans.use: to buy more products for his store.

loans.name: Alfredo Antonio

texts.es:
Alfredo, de 34 años de edad, está casado, debido a que su padre falleció el tuvo que trabajar duro para poder ayudar a su madre y a sus hermanos menores, junto a su esposa han procreado  tres hijos.

Alfredo, trabaja la agricultura desde hace 12 años, cada día que pasa le da gracias a Dios, por darle fuerzas y vida para poder trabajar y poder obtener ingresos para comprar lo que se necesita su familia.

El crédito lo necesita para pagarle a los trabajadores que le ayudaran a cortar el ajonjolí a tiempo, para no tener perdidas y poder sacar su cultivo.

Alfredo, desea apoyar a sus hijos para que estudien y en un futuro sean personas de bien para la sociedad.
texts.en:
34-year old Alfredo is married and has three children. As his father is dead, he had to work hard to help his mother and younger siblings. He has been a farmer for twelve years, and every day that passes he gives thanks to God for giving him strength and life so that he can work and obtain money to buy what his family needs. 

Alfredo is seeking a loan to pay the workers who help him harvest the sesame at the right time so he doesn’t lose any of the seeds.

In the future he wishes to support his children while they are students so they can be good members of society.

loans.use: pay the workers who help him with the sesame seed harvest

loans.name: Carlos Antonio

texts.es:
Carlos de 23 años de edad no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, creció con sus abuelos porque sus padres lo abandonaron, está casado y con su esposa han procreado una hija de 2 años de edad. Carlos se dedica al trabajo con estructuras metálicas, tiene ya 12 años de experiencia en este oficio que aprendió gracias a un amigo que le enseñó y le dio trabajo y es así como hoy se gana la vida y sostiene a su familia.

Solicita el préstamo para comprar pollos de engorde, medicinas y concentrado para engordarlos, ya tiene tres años de trabajar con lotes de pollos y en esta actividad le apoya su esposa. Carlos se proyecta aumentar sus lotes de pollos como alternativa de trabajo ya que siempre le da buenos resultados, espera seguir trabajando duro para que su hija no pase hambre así como pasó él ya que sus abuelos en ocasiones no podían cubrir totalmente los gastos de la casa.
texts.en:
Carlos, age 23, did not have the opportunity to study. He grew up with his grandparents because his parents abandoned him. He is married. He and his wife had a two-year-old daughter. Carlos works with metal structures. He has 12 years' experience in this area; he learned from a friend who taught him and gave him work. Today, this is how he makes a living and sustains his family.
He is requesting this loan to purchase chickens to fatten, as well as medicines and chicken feed to fatten them. He has been working with chickens for three years. His wife helps him with the chicken business. Carlos plans to increase his amount of chickens as an alternative income source because it always gives him good results. He hopes to keep working hard so that his daughter never suffers hunger like he did, because sometimes his grandparents weren't always able to fully cover the household costs.

loans.use: to buy chickens to fatten, as well as feed and medicines.

loans.name: Karoti Group

texts.en:
Siya, who is in her mid 20s, is single. She has been selling clothes and shoes for two years now. She works from 8:00 a.m. to 9:00 p.m. daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.

This will be Siya's second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan to increase her stock of clothes and shoes and has paid back her loan successfully. She used the profit to take care of herself, to pay back the loan, and to cover household expenses. She will use this loan to buy up-to-date clothes and shoes to meet her customers' demands. She dreams of being a successful person.

Siya will share this loan with her loan group, "Karoti," which has two members, who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy up-to-date clothes and shoes to meet  her customers' demands.

loans.name: Hernando

texts.es:
Hernando tiene 28 años de edad, vive junto a sus padres en casa de material rústico en el Caserío Andamarca, distrito de Santo Tomás, provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Su población se dedica a la agricultura (café, piñas, yucas y otros), crianza de animales menores y comercio.

El se dedica a la agricultura, cultiva cafeto desde hace 03 años en una parcela cercana a su vivienda. Ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de abonos órganicos (guano de isla) para su cultivo de café y de esta manera tener una mejor producción y calidad de cosecha para ofrecer a los acopiadores de su distrito, esto le permitirá mejorar su producción, incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Hernando is 28 years old and lives with his parents in a traditional house in the Andamarca village, Santo Tomas district, Cutervo province, Cajamarca region of the northern mountains of Peru. The inhabitants in this area work in farming (coffee, pineapple, yucca and other items), raising small animals and business.

Hernando is a farmer. He has grown Cafeto coffee for 3 years on a parcel near his home. He seeks a loan to buy organic manure for his coffee crop and in this way have a better production and quality of harvest to offer the buyers in his district. This will enable him to improve his production, increase his income, and improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy organic manure for his coffee crop.

loans.name: Simity's Group

texts.fr:
Ce groupe crée depuis Septembre 2014,est constitué de 30 membres qui habitent tous dans la même localité. Leur activité principale est le commerce.

Simity,agée de 56 ans,se trouvant debout a droite de la photo et levant le bras,est notre emprunteuse vedette.
Elle est mariée et mére de cinq enfants dont quatre garçons et une fille.Elle pratique de l'élevage comme activité principale.

Avec son crédit, elle compte acheter deux chévres à 25000f l'une.

Pour son bénéfice, elle compte participer aux charges familiales et aussi renforcer son épargne.
texts.en:
This group was created in September 2014. It is composed of 30 members, all living in the same town. Their main work involves commerce. 

Simity, aged 56, is standing at the right in the photo with an arm raised. She is the featured borrower. She is married and the mother of five children (four boys and a girl). She works in livestock farming as her main work. 

With this loan, she intends to purchase 2 goats at 25,000 francs each. With her profits, she plans on helping to cover family expenses and also to bolster her savings.

loans.use: to purchase goats

loans.name: Tekeu

texts.en:
Tekeu is 30 years old, married to Enole, and blessed with three school-going children. He has been in the farming business for the last 10 years and earns a monthly income of 8,000 KES (Kenyan Shillings).

He has applied for his sixth loan of 60,000 KES from VisionFund Kenya and intends to use the loan amount to buy more seedlings and fertilizers for use in his farm. 

He will use the anticipated profits to provide for his family's basic needs. He hopes to grow his business and venture into large-scale farming.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs (fertilizers and wheat seedlings)

loans.name: Alberto

texts.en:
Alberto is a 33-year-old sari-sari store (variety store) owner from Estancia, Iloilo. Aside from operating a sari-sari store that sells basic items, he also makes peanut butter to sell. Alberto is asking for a loan of 20,000 PHP to buy items for his store, to buy peanut butter ingredients, and to use as capital to start up a tricycle business. His loan will be utilized to buy noodles, eggs, chips, soy sauce, coffee, canned goods, milk, toothpaste, butter, peanuts, cooking oil, and sugar.

Alberto hopes to expand his business so he can support the needs of his three children, ages 4, 7, and 9.

loans.use: to buy noodles, eggs, chips, soy sauce, coffee, canned goods, milk, toothpaste, butter, peanuts, cooking oil, and sugar

loans.name: Mona Grace

texts.en:
Mona Grace works hard to support her family. She is married and has a pig fattening business in the Philippines.

Mona Grace requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase feed, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs.

She has been in this business for 7 years now. Mona Grace would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase feed, vitamins and other supplies for her pigs

loans.name: Lorlyn

texts.en:
Lorlyn works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fishing business in the Philippines.

Lorlyn requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional materials for her business like a fishing net, gasoline, etc.

She has been in this business for 10 years now. In the future, Lorlyn would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials for her business like a fishing net, gasoline, etc

loans.name: Georgina

texts.en:
As a married parent of ten children, Georgina works hard to support her family.

She has a buy and sell banana business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buy and sell of dried coconut meat. Georgina is borrowing PHP 9,000 through NWTF to purchase additional bananas to sell for her buy and sell banana business.

Georgina has been sustaining her business activities through her past 10 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional bananas to sell

loans.name: Yeison Dario

texts.es:
Yeison, de 33 años, ha optado por montar un negocio de comidas cerca a su casa ubicada en el municipio de Medellín, en este negocio vende pasteles de pollo, empanadas, buñuelos, entre otros.

Yeison trabaja todos los días desde las 6 de la mañana hasta la 1 de la tarde, es un hombre muy responsable, juicioso y aplicado con su negocio.

Entre sus sueños más latentes esta el poder tener un restaurante en el que ofrezcan distintos tipos de alimentos y puede ofrecer empleos. Enfrenta múltiples dificultades como el costo de los insumos, la competencia en el sector y las fuertes lluvias que azotan su puesto de trabajo.

El pide un aliento económico para capitalizar su negocio y comprar insumos como pollo, aceite, harina, entre otros.

El crédito impactara su vida y su negocio de un modo muy favorable pues podrá cumplir con su sueño y tendrá una mayor variedad de alimentos para ofrecer a sus clientes, además de que de este negocio depende su hija.

Realiza un préstamo para que la vida de Yeison Sea mucho mejor en su negocio!
texts.en:
Yeison at 33 years old has decide to open a food vending business close to his house in the municipality of Medellín. In this business he sells chicken pastries, empanadas and doughnuts amongst others. Yeison works every day from 6 in the morning until 1 in the afternoon. He is a responsible and level-headed man very committed to his business.

One of the dreams in the back of his mind is to be able to have a restaurant offering a variety of types of food and where he can create employment. He is faced with numerous difficulties such as the cost of supplies, the competition in the market and the rain that lashes his work stand.

He is requesting economic aid to capitalize his business and buy supplies like chicken, oil and flour amongst others. The loan will impact his life and his business in a favorable way as he will be able to achieve his dream and have a greater variety of foods to offer his clients. Also his daughter depends on his business. Make a loan so that the life and the business of Yeison become better.

loans.use: to buy supplies like chicken, oil and flour amongst others.

loans.name: Sherilyn

texts.en:
Sherilyn is 34 years old, is married and has four children. Three of Sherilyn's children are currently in school.

Sherilyn is in the agricultural business, raising livestock in the Philippines. Sherilyn has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase feeds, vitamins and other supplies for her livestock.

Sherilyn has been raising livestock for 10 years now, and has borrowed 24 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Sherilyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase feeds, vitamins and other supplies for her livestock

loans.name: Marlene

texts.en:
Marlene is 50 years old and married with two children.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Marlene is borrowing PHP 17,000 through NWTF to purchase additional feed and piglets.

Marlene has been raising pigs for six years and earns additional income from her general store.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional feed and piglets

loans.name: Jenelyn

texts.en:
Jenelyn is 31 years old and married with two children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, etc.

Jenelyn has borrowed and paid seven loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for four years and also earns an income from farming rice, raising pigs and rice retailing.

Jenelyn aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo, canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, etc

loans.name: Rutchel

texts.en:
Rutchel is 41 years old and married with three children.

Rutchel works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional items like canned goods, snack foods, coffee, sugar, juice, cereals, soft drinks, etc. to sell.

Rutchel has borrowed and repaid six loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for three years and earns additional income from selling vegetables and coconut wine.

Rutchel aspires to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase additional items like canned goods, snack foods, coffee, sugar, juice, cereals, soft drinks, etc. to sell

loans.name: Djes-Taoré Group

texts.fr: Lizata est la responsable du groupe Djes Taoré, elle est mariée et mère d'un enfant scolarisé. Cette brave dame vend des condiments( choux, tomates,poivrons, piments, persils, oignons, etc) depuis 7 ans. En plus de cela, elle vend du soumbala, un produit local fait à partir des grains du néeré, le soumbala est très consommé par les burkinabés et en Afrique de l'ouest. Lizata a besoin de ce prêt pour s'approvisionner quotidiennement en légumes pour satisfaire sa clientèle. A l'issue des ventes,  son bénéfice lui permettra de contribuer pour la gestion de sa famille et de continuer son activité.
texts.en: Lizata is the official of the group Djes Taoré. She is a married mother of one child in school. This good and honest woman has been selling condiments (cabbages, tomatoes, bell peppers, chili peppers, parsley, onions, etc.) for seven years. In addition, she sells “soumbala”, a local product made from néré seeds. Soumbala is much consumed by the people in Burkina Faso and in western Africa. Lizata has need of this loan to stock up each day on vegetables in order to satisfy her customers. After her sales, her profits will enable her to help manager her family and to continue with her business.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables (cabbages, tomatoes, onions, cucumbers, zucchini,...) to sell

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida lives in the village Tsovagyugh in the Gegharkunik region. She is not married and she lives with her retired mother. Aida graduated from medical college and for many years she worked as a nurse at the Sevan city’s hospital. Now, she is unemployed and is trying to develop a farm. Aida’s mother is 77 years old, but fortunately she is healthy and she greatly helps her daughter in farming. On her farm Aida has two cows, a calf, five sheep, two piglets, two lambs and 15 chickens. Her farm’s milk, eggs, and meat contribute to her family’s income, but Aid hopes to earn more. It will be possible if she manages to solve her health problem, since she feels some pains, which were not strong at first, but now she is worried and she wants to find the reason for the pain.

A loan of 500,000 Armenian drams will be a great support and help Aida to have a proper medical examination and find out the problem.

loans.use: to pay for a proper medical examination and find out the problem

loans.name: Yurik

texts.en:
Yurik is 45 years old and he lives in the village of Khedrants in the Syunik region. He is not married and he lives with his retired lovely mother. Yurik is engaged in farming, but he always combines it with different work for which he manages to be employed. Yurik worked as a tractor driver, then at the post office, again as a driver. Now he is also busy with farming and he drives a taxi. On his farm Yurik has three cows, a bull, a heifer and 30 chickens. Yurik’s mother sells all of his farm goods such as milk, macun (Armenian national dairy-product), meat and eggs, to their regular customers. 

Yurik wants to enlarge his farm with two  heifers and a pig, and for this he asks for a Kiva loan. He hopes for support for which he is thankful beforehand.

loans.use: to buy two heifers and a pig in order to enlarge his farm

loans.name: Verzhine

texts.en:
This nice lady’s name is Verzhine and she lives in Sevan city in the Gegharkunik region. She has attained a high level of education and for 20 years she has worked at the school as a teacher of Armenian History, with great pleasure and devotion to her pupils. Verzhine’s husband, also a pedagogue, works at the same school as his wife. Their children are already married, and they live separately with their families.

Verzhine says that for a long time she has wanted to have a computer, since both she and her husband need it in their pedagogical activities. As she says, the New Year's holiday is the perfect period for this purchase since all the markets invite their customers to do shopping with great sales, and she is sure that this Kiva loan will be great to buy a computer and a suitable table and chair for it. As she says, this will be a pleasant New Year gift both for her and her husband.

loans.use: to buy a computer and a suitable table and chair for it

loans.name: Sona

texts.en:
Sona lives in Kapan city in the Syunik region. She is divorced and lives alone now, since her daughter is married and lives with her family and Sona’s son temporally lives and works in the Russian Federation. Sona is a pedagogue with 26 years of experience. She has a high level of education and is a specialist in Armenian Language and Literature. Sona now is the director of the school where many years ago she started her pedagogical activities. She is also very famous of her private courses of high quality that she gives at her house, preparing the pupils for the entrance examinations.

Sona hopes that she will be supported by Kiva's generous lenders. The loan that she seeks will help her to buy a computer, professional literature, and also bookshelves that will decorate and make her working room cuter.

loans.use: to buy a computer, professional literature, and also bookshelves that will decorate and make her working room cuter

loans.name: Karine

texts.en:
Karine is a very artistic person who lives in Vanadzor city in the Lori region. Karine is married and she has a son and a daughter. Karine has a vocational musical education and she has already worked for 25 years at the musical college of the city as a pianist. 

As she says she is just in love with her profession, through the private courses that she gives at her house and college lessons, she tries to keep the younger generation closer to the culture and particularly to the music.  She is a greatly respected and beloved teacher among her pupils, and she fills both her lessons at the college and private courses at home with interesting and useful information. This loan will help Karine to buy a computer and professional literature, to make her lessons more interesting, attractive and entertaining.

loans.use: to buy a computer and professional literature, to make her lessons more interesting, attractive and entertaining

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
Julio, es un señor que se dedica al destazo de cerdo y res, lo realiza a tiempo completo con ayuda de su familia, adquiere los animales cuidando que se encuentren saludables para luego destazarlos y vender la carne a sus clientes, don Julio tiene 54 años de edad, vive con su esposa de 34 años de edad y cuatro hijos de 17, 14 y 11 años de edad  y  uno de seis meses de nacido, él es el único que trabaja para llevar el sustento diario a su hogar.
El capital le ayudara a poder comprar un cerdo y una res, incrementara la productividad de su negocio para hacer las entregas de los pedidos que sus clientes han hecho en esta temporada, espera mejorar sus ventas y ganancias, de esta manera resarcirá su deuda sin problemas.
Sus sueños son mantener el negocio y apoyar a sus hijos para que sigan estudiando.
texts.en:
Julio works butchering pigs and cattle; work he has been doing full-time with his family's help. He acquires animals, taking care of them so that they are healthy and he can later slaughter them and sell the meat to his customers. 

Julio is 54 years old, lives with his wife 34, and four children ages 17, 14, 11 and six months. He is the only one who works to support their household. 

The loan will help him to to be able to buy a pig and a head of cattle. He will increase the productivity of his business so that he can make delivery on orders that his customers have placed this season. He hopes to improve sales and earnings and this way he will pay off his debt with no problems. His dreams are to keep his business going and support his children so that they can continue their schooling.

loans.use: To buy a pig and one head of cattle.

loans.name: Noe Lisandro

texts.es:
Noé de 58 años de edad estudió hasta 9° grado de educación básica, está acompañado y tiene dos hijos de 20my 28 años de edad, su pareja es ama de casa y junto a sus hijos le apoyan en las labores agrícolas.

Noé es agricultor, oficio que aprendió trabajando con sus padres, todos los días se levanta a las 4:00 am con su esposa e hijos a trabajar en el campo, luego ellos regresan a la casa, ella se dedica a los oficio del hogar y al ordeño del ganado, el hace viajes en un vehículo que posee.

Solicita el préstamo para comprar una pareja de bueyes que necesita para facilitar la recolección de la cosecha así como alquilarlos para realizar labores agrícolas. Noé espera que con los ingresos que obtenga de las próximas inversiones pueda cancelar sus deudas y trabajar con dinero propio.
texts.en:
Noé is 58 years old, studied until the 9th grade of basic education, and has two children who are 20 and 28 years. His spouse is a housewife and together with his children they help him with agricultural work. Noé is a farmer, a profession that he learned working with his parents. Everyday he gets up at 4:00 am with his wife and children to work in the fields. Later, they return home and his wife does housework and milks the cows, while he makes trips in the vehicle he has.

He is asking for the loan to buy a pair of oxen that he needs to make harvesting easier and to rent them to others for farm work. Noé hopes that with the income that he will get from these next investments he will be able to pay off his debts and work with his own money.

loans.use: to buy a pair of oxen.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to expand into a larger space and purchase more high-end inventory.

loans.name: Narine

texts.en: Narine is an experienced agronomist from Garnahovit village of Aragatsotn region. She lives with her husband and three school-age children (two sons, 16 and 14 years old and a 7-year-old daughter). To take care of the family's needs, Narine, with the help of her husband, is engaged in cattle breeding, breeding pigs and sheep and in cultivation of potatoes and grass. They sell the agricultural products in the local market, and this is the main source of the family's income. To continue running her agribusiness in a sustainable way and to develop it further, Narine needs a loan of USD 1,500 to purchase four piglets and to buy some forage for the livestock. Narine and her family highly rely on the goodwill of the lenders and will appreciate their support in collecting the needed loan to maintain and develop their agribusiness.

loans.use: to purchase four piglets and to buy some forage for the livestock

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a computer.

loans.name: Santos Matilde

texts.es: Santos de 39 años de edad se gana la vida vendiendo semilla de marañón a un costado de la carretera y al ser un lugar de mucha afluencia de personas sus ventas son muy buenas, dicha actividad la realiza desde hace 4 años. Ella habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañero de vida y sus 2 hijos de 13 y 12 años de edad. Santos desea invertir en su negocio ya que en esta época navideña las ventas son mejores por la gran cantidad de turistas y de personas que viven en el extranjero que visitan el país  y comprar por grandes cantidades para exportar por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en semillas de marañón por mayoreo.
texts.en:
Santos, age 39, earns her living selling cashew nuts at a stand on the side of a highway. Her sales are very good since it's an affluent area, and she's been in business for about four years. She lives in her own home with her partner and their two children, ages 13 and 12 years. 

Santos wants to invest in her business for the Christmas season when sales are highest. There are a lot of tourists who come to visit the country, and people who come from abroad often buy a lot of nuts to export. She is requesting this loan from FUSAI which she will use to buy cashews at wholesale.

loans.use: invest in purchasing cashew nuts at wholesale

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in cocoa, sugar, cinnamon, animal feed, vitamins, and pigs.

loans.name: Fredi Eduardo

texts.es: Fredi de 20 años de edad es un joven soltero que habita junto a su grupo familiar en vivienda propia. Él se gana la vida como cocinero actividad que le permite salir adelante, pero además cuenta con un negocio de venta de granos básicos que su padre le apoya en atender mientras trabaja. Fredi desea tener una mayor cantidad de productos para ofrecer a su clientela ya que en época navideña las ventas de granos básicos mejoran, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en granos básicos para tener una mayor cantidad de productos para ofrecer en esta época navideña.
texts.en:
Fredi, age 20, is a single young man who lives with his family in their own home. He earns his living as a cook so that he can get ahead. In addition, he has a business of selling basic grains. His father helps him by managing the business while he is at his job.

Fredi wants to have a larger quantity of products that he can offer to his customers during the Christmas season so that his sales of basic grains can improve. For this reason, he is requesting a loan from FUSAI so that he can invest in basic grains. This will help him to have a greater quantity of products to offer during the Christmas season.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains that he can sell in his business.

loans.name: Paula

texts.es: Paula tiene 34 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus padres, hermano y un sobrino. Paula trabaja como empleada doméstica desde hace mucho tiempo. Paula desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de ventanas y puertas para su vivienda y así dar mayor seguridad a su familia. Espera poder contar con este financiamiento y así dar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida.
texts.en:
Paula is 34 years old and she lives in her own home with her parents, a brother, and a nephew. 

She has worked in domestic services for a long time now.

She wants to improve the condition of her home, and she's requesting this loan from FUSAI  to buy windows and doors. This will improve the family's safety. 

Paula hopes to get the loan so she can provide better living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to buy doors and windows for her home.

loans.name: Alba Noemi

texts.es: Alba tiene 29 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su hijo de 7 años de edad. Su esposo emigró al extranjero con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida. Alba es una mujer increíble, muchas personas dan buenas referencias de su integridad y responsabilidad. Con el deseo de mejorar sus condiciones de vida ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la construcción de un muro dado que por falta de recursos económicos no ha logrado terminar. Con el monto solicitado comprará cemento, arena, ladrillo, hierro, etc.
texts.en: Alba, age 29, lives with her 7-year-old son in their own home. Her husband went abroad to try and improve their living conditions. Alba is an amazing person; many people have given her good references regarding her integrity and her responsibility.  To try and improve her family's living conditions, Alba decided to come to FUSAI for a loan which she will use to complete a wall in her home that she's been unable to complete herself due to a lack of money. With the money from the loan, she will buy cement, sand, bricks, iron bars, and so on.

loans.use: buy materials to build a wall in her home

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
Marina tiene 45 años de edad, vive sola en una casa alquilada de material rústico, en la parte rural del distrito de Querocotillo, provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. La población de este distrito se dedica principalmente a la agricultura y comercio.

Marina se dedica a la venta de abarrotes en general así como ropa, su negocio está ubicado en su domicilio. Marina cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en el distrito. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de mayor cantidad de mercadería para su negocio, con ello contará con un mayor inventario en su tienda, obtendrá mayores ingresos y así podrá mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Marina, age 45 lives alone in a rented house made of basic materials.  She lives in the rural part of the Querocotillo district, Cutervo province, Cajamarca region, in the northern highlands of Peru.  The population of this district primarily works in agriculture and commerce.

Maria sells general groceries and clothes.  Her business is located at her house.  Maria has very good personal and work references in the district.

The loan will be used to buy more merchandise for her business.  With this she will have greater inventory at her store, she will be able to get more earnings, and she will be able to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise for her business.

loans.name: Segundo Juan

texts.es:
Segundo tiene 61 años de edad, es conviviente, vive con su familia en el distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La población del distrito se dedica a la agricultura, crianza de animales y comercio.

Segundo se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales como patos, gallinas, gallos, pollos, etc. con más de 10 años de experiencia en el negocio, contando con muy buenas referencia personales y laborales en el distrito. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de una mayor cantidad de animales para su negocio, dicha inversión le servirá para tener mayor variedad y productividad en animales, lo que tendrá una gran influencia en el negocio; Segundo piensa incrementar su stock de animales para poder atender los diversos gustos y necesidades de los clientes de la zona, con esto logrará aumentar sus ingresos y por ende su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Segundo, age 61, is married, and he lives with his family in the Oyotún district, Chiclayo province, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru.  The district’s population works in agriculture, raising animals, and in commerce.

Segundo raises and sells animals like ducks, hens, roosters, and chickens, etc.  He has over ten years of experience in the business.   He has very good personal and work references in the district.

The loan will be used to buy more animals for his business.  This investment will give him a greater variety of animals and greater productivity.  This will have a great impact on his business.  Segundo plans to increase his stock of animals in order to be able to take care of the diverse tastes and needs of the customers in the area.  With this he will manage to increase his earnings and, therefore, his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy more animals for his business.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.en:
Mercedes is 51 years old and married with four children who are in school. Mercedes works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a loan of 15,000 PHP through NWTF to buy additional items to sell, such as canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, etc.

Mercedes has been in this business for nine years.

In the future, Mercedes would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell, such as canned goods, eggs, milk, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Rosie

texts.en:
Rosie works hard to support her family. Rosie is married and has a buy and sell banana business in the Philippines.

She has requested a loan of 28,000 PHP through NWTF to purchase additional sacks of bananas to sell.

Rosie has been in this business for six years now.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional sacks of bananas to sell

loans.name: Franklin Isaac

texts.es:
Franklin, mantiene su negocio con vida, el préstamo anterior le ayudo a tener un mejor equipo de trabajo y variedad de repuestos para vehículos, con ellos el servicio a sus clientes es mejor y su trabajo tiene mayor calidad.
Nuevamente requiere un préstamo que utilizara en la compra de cables, grasa, luces, amortiguadores, etc., seguirá teniendo herramientas para trabajar y seguir saliendo adelante.
texts.en:
Franklin continues to keep his business going. The previous loan helped Franklin to maintain a better team of employees and provide a wider variety of spare parts for vehicles. In this way, the service to the clients has improved and the quality of his work is higher.

Once again, Franklin requires a loan to buy cables, grease, lights, shock-absorbers, etc., to continue having tools to work with and to be able to keep moving forward.

loans.use: to buy cables, grease, lights, shock-absorbers, etc., to continue having tools to work with and to be able to keep moving forward.

loans.name: Azat

texts.en:
Azat lives in Kapan city in the Syunik region.  He has a specialty in engineering and for many years he worked in this area. In general, Azat is a very hard-working, active, and intellectual person and all his life while being employed in different places he never gave up farming. He worked at the factory as an engineer; then he worked at the school as a teacher of mathematics; he also worked at the municipality; and now he is seriously busy with farming and also works as a forester.

Azat has a rather rich farm where he takes care of six cows, two bulls, six heifers, and seven piglets. As he says, he likes to do everything around his farm himself and the profit from farming he calls his own hard-earned money. Azat now lives alone, since his wife, daughter, and son live in Yerevan city, where he regularly visits them and brings them all the goods from his farm, such as milk, cheese, and fresh meat. As he says, he will never move from his farm’s nice scene and its bracing fresh air to the city’s noisy life.

Azat will use this loan for the purchase of a lot of animal fodder for his cattle since for him with coming of winter it is the most important problem that he usually solves as quickly as he can.

loans.use: for the purchase of a lot of animal fodder for his cattle for the winter period

loans.name: Sandra Elizabeth

texts.es:
Sandra, cuenta que su negocio ha crecido, atiende nuevos clientes, las deudas poco a poco las va cancelando y su familia se encuentra muy saludable y brindándole apoyo para seguir trabajando.
Poe motivo de las fiestas navideñas requiere de un nuevo crédito con el que comprará prendas de vestir para ambos sexos, sandalias y también papas, plátanos, bolsas, azúcar, etc., para elaborar la venta de meriendas.
texts.en:
Sandra says that her business has grown. She has new clients, she has been repaying her debt bit by bit, and her family is very healthy and supports her so that she can continue working.
Because of the Christmas holidays, she needs a new loan to purchase clothing for both sexes, sandals, bags, and also potatoes, bananas, sugar, etc for making snacks.

loans.use: to buy clothing for both sexes, sandals, bags, and potatoes, bananas, sugar, etc for making snacks.

loans.name: Sujey Guadalupe

texts.es: Sujey es una mujer dedicada a su trabajo, ya que su profesión es licenciada en ciencias naturales, se dedica a impartir clases de educación primaria en un colegio fue de la zona donde habita, ya que tiene que viajar al mismo, es casada, con dos hijos a su cargo a los que le brinda el apoyo necesario para su desarrollo,  esta señora se presento a las oficinas de Ceprodel para solicitar financiamiento el que utilizaría en la  compra da cemento, arena, hierro y mano de obra, y poder realizar las obras de mejoramiento de cuarto, el que le dará   las   condiciones de vida digna para su familia..
texts.en: Sujey is a woman who is dedicated to her work. She has a bachelor's degree in science. She teaches at a local elementary school. She has to travel to get there. She is married with two children whom she supports in their development. This woman came to Ceprodel to request a loan which she will use in the purchase of cement, sand, and iron, and to pay the labourers. This way she will be able to improve a room in order to provide dignified living conditions for her family.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and iron, and to pay the labourers.

loans.name: Magaly Salvadora

texts.es: Magaly tiene 49 años de edad, es duaña de una tienda de productos comestibles(consumo diario),ha tenido su tienda desde hace varios años ya que el mismo negocio le a dado la oportunidad de ayudar a su familia economicamente, en esta oportunidad ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de de mercaderia para su tienda como lo son:fideos,arroz,frijol etc, ya que su anhelo es tener un local mas grande que el actual y por eso sigue luchando dia con dia para seguir adelante con su negocio, les agradece por su ayuda atravez de los credito, porque solo con el capital que tiene su negocio no estaria en aumento.
texts.en:
Magaly is 49 years old.  She is the owner of a grocery store.  She has had her store for many years since the same business has given her the opportunity to help her family economically.

In this opportunity she is requesting this loan to buy merchandise for her store such as pasta, rice, beans, etc. since her longing is to have a bigger store than the current one.  Therefore, she continues fighting day by day to get ahead with her business.  She thanks you for the help through the loan because with only the capital that her business has, she would not be able to grow.

loans.use: To buy products for daily consumption.

loans.name: Santos Sifredo

texts.es:
Santos, de 32 años de edad, no estudio, está casado y tiene 2 hijos junto a su esposa.- Es una persona que desde sus nueve años de edad, junto a su padre se ha dedicado a la agricultura.- Hoy en día, es agricultor y trabaja todos los días para comprar lo que ellas necesitan. 

El crédito lo necesita para comprar fertilizantes para sus cultivos y que la cosecha sea buena.

Santos, planea sembrar 21,000 metros cuadrados de terreno que es propiedad de su suegra y de esa manera ayudar a su familia, especialmente a sus hijos para que estudien y puedan salir adelante y sean personas de bien y al servicio de la sociedad.
texts.en:
Santos, age 32, didn't go to school. He is married, and he and his wife have two children. He, alongside his father, has worked in agriculture since he was nine years old. Today, he is a full-time farmer and he works every day to buy what his family needs.

He needs this loan so that he can buy fertilizer for his crops, ensuring that the harvest will be good. He plans to plant 21,000 square meters of land that his mother-in-law owns. This will help him help his family, particularly by sending his children to school so that they can get ahead and become good people, of service to society.

loans.use: buy fertilizer to ensure a good harvest

loans.name: Jessica Denisse

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Nuestra Señora De la Luz se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
Aquí vive la señorita Jessica, tiene 20 años  de edad, está soltera y estudia Ing. forestal en la universidad local.  Ella vive en casa de los padres.
Doña Jessica es una joven muy trabajadora que para obtener sus propios recursos y con esto ayudarles a sus padres y para sus propios gastos que generan sus estudios se dedica a la venta de ropa, zapatos, carteras, perfumes, cremas entre otros productos que le envían desde Los Estados Unidos, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta, sale tres veces por semana y también vende en su casa y en la universidad donde estudia, ella deja sus productos a crédito y cobra cada ocho días. Tiene 1  año que se dedica a esta actividad con la cual se gana lo suyo que le permite seguir adelante esperando tener una buena profesión
Este crédito es para pagar mercadería que esta por recibir como  ropa,  zapatos,  perfumes, entre otros. Este es su segundo ciclo en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan mucho. Sus sueños son terminar sus estudios y ser una gran profesional.
texts.en:
The “Our Lady of Light” Credit Group meets each 15 days in the city of Manta, known for its beautiful beaches which are visited at all times of the year, and for being a city of beauty without equal with many tourist attractions.

It is here that Miss Jessica lives. She is 20 years old, single, and studies Forestry Engineering at the local university. She lives in her parents' house.

Jessica is a young worker who, to obtain her own resources, help her parents, and to pay her own school costs, sells clothing, shoes, wallets, perfumes, and skin creams, among other products sent to her from the United States. Jessica sells door to door, venturing out three times a week. She also sells from her home and at the university where she studies. Jessica sells her products on credit and collects the cash each eight days. She has done this for one year, earning what she needs, which allows her to continue ahead, hoping to achieve a good profession.

This loan will pay for merchandise now on order, including clothing, shoes, and perfumes, among other items. This is Jessica's second loan cycle with her credit group, a group she likes because these loans are a great help. 

Jessica's dreams are to complete her studies and to become a great professional.

loans.use: buy clothing, shoes, perfumes, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Cynthia

texts.en:
Cynthia hails from Estancia, Iloilo. She is 58 years old, with eight children. Two of them are ages 15 and 18, while the rest are already adults. 

Cynthia is engaged in making strawberry jams and peanut butter for a living. She also buys and sells cattle and goats in the market for a profit. She started these businesses in 2005. 

She is asking a loan of PHP 30,000 to buy ingredients for her business, such as strawberries, sugar, peanuts, butter, and cooking oil. Cynthia hope that, in the long run, she will be able to expand her business, so she can take good care of her family.

loans.use: to buy strawberries, sugar, peanuts, butter, and cooking oil.

loans.name: María Zeira

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Nuestra Señora De la Luz se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 51 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión  libre y de esta relación tiene dos hijos mayores  de edad, ellos  estudian en universidad y aun viven con ellos. Su esposo es mecánico.
Doña María realiza el crédito para que su marido lo utilice en su trabajo, él tiene un taller de soldadura en un local que alquila cerca de su casa, allí él con la ayuda de dos personas más elaboran puertas, ventanas y cualquier tiempo de estructuras con el metal, el trabajo casi no le falta ya que es muy bueno en lo que hace y responsable razón por lo cual le buscan para que él les realice sus obras, el lleva más de 30 años dedicado a esta actividad con la cual se gana el sustento diario y es fuente de ingresos de las personas que laboran con él.
Este crédito es para comprar metal, pinturas, soldaduras y otros materiales para elaborar sus obras. Lleva tres ciclos en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque los créditos les sirven de mucha ayuda. Sus sueños son seguir adelante.
texts.en:
The Nuestra Señora De la Luz communal bank group meets every 15 days in Manta, a city known for its lovely beaches that are frequently visited all year around, a city of unequaled beauty with many tourist attractions. 

This is where Maria lives. She is 51 years old and in a common law relationship. With her partner she has two adult children who go to college and are still living at home. Her partner is a mechanic. 

Maria's loan is to be used for her partner's work. He has a welding shop located in a rented space near their home. He works with the help of two other people making doors, windows, and any type of metal structure. He does not lack for work, for the most part, because he is very good at what he does and also responsible, so he is in demand. He's been doing this work for over 30 years, it is how he earns a living and he is also a source of income to the people workíng with him.

This loan is to buy metal, paint, solders, and other materials for his workshop. 

This is Maria's third loan cycle with the group and she likes it because the loans help them greatly. Her dream is to keep up and get ahead.

loans.use: to buy metal, paint, solders and other materials.

loans.name: Josphine

texts.en:
Josphine is 43 years old. She is a responsible mother of three sons and two daughters. She is a housewife and looks after her family, which is comprised of seven persons.

She is well trained in cloth stitching and provides stitching services to customers at her own house. She needs to purchase a sewing machine for her stitching work. This is very important for her to continue her work efficiently and professionally. However, the lack of money has made this difficult. So Josphine is requesting a loan from Kiva partner BRAC Pakistan.

BRAC Pakistan issued her loan, as she requested. Josphine is very thankful to Kiva's partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for stitching clothing.

loans.name: Rafaela Del Socorro

texts.es: La señora Rafaela es una mujer emprendedora y preocupado por el bienestar de su familia es soltera con un hijo a su cargo, labora como conserje en un colegio de la localidad donde vive, además trabaja en un restaurante en lo tiempos libres para la obtención de otros ingresos, esta señora tiene la necesidad de mejorar las condiciones de su familia, por eso visito  A Ceprodel para solicitar financiamiento el que utilizaría en la Compra de cocina con su tanque y reparar Refrigeradora, la que mejorara las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Rafaela is an enterprising woman who is concerned for the well-being of her family. She is single and has one child in her care. She works as a custodian at a high school in her neighborhood. She also works at a restaurant in her free time as an additional source of income. She needs to help her family, so she visited Ceprodel to request this loan. She will use it to buy a stove with propane tank and to repair her refrigerator. This will improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: purchase a gas-powered stove and repair her refrigerator

loans.name: Celestino

texts.es:
Celestino tiene 57 años de edad, es casado, su familia es unida. Vive junto a su cónyuge y sus 02 hijos en una casa de material rústico (piedra y barro) en el caserío de Miraflores, distrito de Santo Tomás, provincia de Cutervo, región Cajamarca, en la sierra norte de Perú. Su población se dedica a la agricultura (café, yucas y frutales), crianza de animales menores como gallinas, patos, pavos y cuyes y al comercio de los mismos.

Celestino se dedica a la agricultura, especialmente al cultivo de cafeto, con 07 años de experiencia en el sector. Cuenta con buenas referencias personales y laborales en el distrito. El crédito será utilizado para la compra de abonos y fertilizantes para dar mantenimiento a su parcela de café que esta ubicada cerca a su vivienda. De esta manera tendrá una mejor producción y cosecha para ofrecer a los acopiadores de su distrito, lo que tendrá un impacto positivo en sus ingresos, mejorando su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Celestino is a 57-year-old married man with a close-knit family. He lives with his wife and their 2 children in a house made of rustic material (stone and mud). They live in the small village of Miraflores, district of Santo Tomás, province of Cutervo, in the Cajamarca region in the northern mountains of Perú. The people there make a living in agriculture (coffee, yucas, fruits) and raising and trading young animals such as hens, ducks, turkeys, and guinea pigs.

Celestino makes a living in agriculture, primarily in the cultivation of coffee trees. He has 7 years of experience, and has good personal and professional references in his district. The loan will be used to buy organic fertilizers and other fertilizers to maintain his plot of coffee that is located near his home. With this, he will have a more productive harvest to offer the middlemen in his district, which will have a positive effect on his income, improving his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizers and other fertilizers to maintain his coffee crop.

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is 37 years old, married, and has two children, one of whom is currently in school. She works very hard to provide for them. Marites runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a 15,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

Marites has been in this business for two years and sells a variety of items such as candies, biscuits, soft drinks, chocolate drinks, beers, detergent soap, etc. She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store

loans.name: Salvacion

texts.en:
Salvacion is a 31-year-old, married woman with three children, who are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

She has a business buying and selling fruits and vegetables in the Philippines. Salvacion requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stocks of fruits and vegetables to sell.  Salvacion has been in this business for five years. 

In the future, Salvacion would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Liza

texts.en:
