texts.en: Dairiimaa, 40 years old, lives with her husband and three children in Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. She and her husband have been selling fruits to local people since 2002. Their elder two sons go to high school and the youngest one stays at home. She is requesting a loan of 2600 USD to buy a light truck for fruit delivery. She supplies fruits to many retailers who want their order on time without delay. Now she is renting a truck for this purpose, but doing so reduces her revenue greatly. So buying a light truck is essential for her future business success.

loans.use: to buy a light truck for fruit delivery.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay for her school fees.

loans.name: Sok

texts.en: Sok is a 51-year-old married ice cream vendor with six children who lives in Kampong Speu province in Cambodia. So far he has been in the business for over 15 years. His wife is a 43-year-old homemaker. Five of the children are factory workers and the youngest one attends school. Together, they can earn around USD 31.66 a day. His son will get engaged soon, so Sok has decided to apply for a loan to pay the dowry. With the loan, he will be able to hold an engagement party for his son successfully. His next plan is to help the youngest child to earn a bachelor’s degree.

loans.use: to pay a dowry.

loans.name: Wilfredo De Jesus

texts.es: Wilfredo de 24 años de edad es un hombre emprendedor que desde hace 5 años se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado bovino los fines de semana y durante la semana trabaja en una ruta de transporte colectivo en su municipio. Él habita en vivienda propia junto a su madre y su hermana desde hace mucho tiempo.  Wilfredo desea invertir en su negocio de compra y venta de ganado bovino ya que entre más compra mayores son las ganancias que percibe, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en ganado bovino y así poder seguir apoyando a su madre en su vejez.
texts.en: Wilfredo, 24 years old, is an enterprising man who for the past 5 years has worked buying and selling cattle on the weekends and during the week he works on a public transportation route in his city.  Wilfredo wants to invest in his business buying and selling cattle since as more large purchases come in, he sees more earnings, so he asks FUSAI for a loan to invest in cattle, and in this way be able to continue supporting his mother in her old age.

loans.use: to invest in cattle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, and labor costs to cement the floor of her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a battery and a charging station for the solar energy system in her house.

loans.name: Armando

texts.es: Armando de 50 años de edad habita en vivienda propia junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo de 11 años de edad que se encuentra estudiando con su apoyo. Él se desempeña como albañil independiente desde hace 20 años por lo que cuenta con una gran cantidad de clientes que buscan sus servicios. Armando desea cambiar el techo de su vivienda que se encuentra deteriorado y teme que en cualquier momento pueda caer ocasionando un accidente a su familia por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: madera, clavos, alambre y lámina para cambiar el techo de su vivienda lo antes posible y evitar algún accidente.
texts.en:
Armando is 50 years old, married, and the father of an 11-year-old son who attends school thanks to his parents's support. Armando has been an independent contractor working in construction for 20 years, and has a large base of customers who seek out his services. 

Armando wants to replace the roof on his home as its condition has worsened and he's afraid it might collapse on his family at any time and injure them. He's therefore applying for a loan from FUSAI to purchase wood, nails, wire, and sheeting so he can replace the roof as soon as possible and protect his family from an accident.

loans.use: to purchase wood, nails, wire, and sheeting to replace the roof on his home.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more coffee and tea and some supplies for his cafe.

loans.name: Rene Orlando

texts.es: Rene de 47 años de edad es un hombre emprendedor que se gana la vida con su negocio de compra y venta de granos básicos actividad que realiza desde hace 9 años y que le ha permitido sostener la economía de su hogar. Él habita en vivienda propia junto a su madre por lo que se siente feliz de poder apoyarla y acompañarla en su vejez. Rene desea comprar y vender granos básicos por mayor para poder contar con mejores ingresos económicos, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: frijoles, maíz, arroz, etc. Para distribuir una mayor cantidad de productos obteniendo mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en: Rene is 47 years old, an enterprising man who earns a living with his business buying and selling basic grains. He has had this business for 9 years and it has enabled him to support his household. He lives in his own house with his mother and he is happy to be able to support her and be with her in her old age.  Rene wishes to buy and sell basic grains at whoelsale to be able to be assured of better income, so he seeks a loan from FUSAI to buy beans, corn, rice, etc. in order to distribute a large quantity of products resulting in better income.

loans.use: to buy beans, corn, rice, etc.

loans.name: Haticha

texts.en:
Haticha is 53 years old. She is a hard working woman with a great desire to progress in life. She is divorced and has 2 children.

Haticha is one of the successful business women of her town. For more than 10 years she has been busy with buying and selling clothes. She knows all aspects of her business very well. Her experience and skills help her to develop her business and in this way improve her living conditions. She wants to develop her business further but her income is small and she needs your help and mercy.

She is asking for a loan of 2000 TJS to buy clothes for increasing her working capital. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to buy clothes and increase her working capital.

loans.name: Elysito

texts.en:
Elysito operates as a motorcycle driver. He earns a living by transporting customers from one place to remote areas. He is a 47-year-old married man from Dulag, Leyte. He has been engaged in a motorcycle transport service for five years now.

He is asking for a loan to purchase tires, fuel and motorcycle maintenance like oil change. These will help Elysito operate his livelihood smoothly and hassle free. He could now earn more, and set aside some savings for emergency needs. He can now start to pay his loan and other daily expenses.

In the future, Elysito dreams of expanding his current business to be successful and to have a stable source of income.

loans.use: to purchase tires, fuel and motorcycle maintenance like oil change

loans.name: Dúo Sinai Group

texts.es:
DUO SINAI 
El cual esta conformado por la señora Telma quien es  propietaria de una venta de zapatos y sandalias en el mercado en el cual le ha ido muy bien pues ha logrado cada mes poder invertir en su negocio ya que el sueño de lla no es solo tener un puesto de zapatos  si no que poder logar tener muchos mas para con ello poder ayudar a sus hijos aunque ya no tiene muchos a su cargo  ella desea y sueña porder brindarles su ayuda y poder darles un buen estilo de vida esperando que en esta ocasión se le pueda tomar en cuenta dicha solicitud ya que nececita comprar mercaderia en Zapatos para vender.
texts.en: The "Sinai Duo" is comprised of two members, including Telma, who owns a shoe and sandal store in the market. Things have been going well, since she has been able to invest in her business each month. Her dream is to not only have one shoe shop but to have many more so that she can help her children.  Although she does not have many children left at home she dreams of continuing to help them and offering them a good style of life. Currently she is requesting a loan in order to purchase merchandise for her shoe store.

loans.use: To purchase shoes for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy galvanized sheet, nails and wire to change the roof of his house.

loans.name: Eulicita

texts.en: Eulicita has a small parcel of coconut land, which she cultivates as a source of income, but her earnings are not enough to sustain her daily needs. Eulicita learned about Paglaum MPC regarding their services offered to members and she decided to join.  She is very happy, because Paglaum trusted  her the amount of 5,000PHP required to start her retailing business. She wants to  buy coconut shells for charcoal making and packs it for retail for additional source of income.  She sell her charcoal in neighboring town.  Eulicita plan to buy 2nd hand motor cycle which use for charcoal delivery someday.

loans.use: to buy coconut shells for charcoal

loans.name: Rosa Abigail

texts.es:
Rosa, tiene una venta de tortillas y pupusas, es casada, junto a su esposo ha procreado 3 hijos, todos viven juntos, atiende su negocio de seis de la mañana a cuatro de la tarde, en el transcurso del día ella realiza ambas actividades, el oficio lo heredo de su familia.
Invertirá en maíz, quesillos, chicharrón, tomates, aderezos, etc., incrementara su inventario para tener mejor productividad, atender mejor a sus clientes y aumentar sus ganancias, espera no tener dificultades para cancelar su deuda.
Sus sueños son ampliar su negocio, hacerle mejoras a su vivienda y darles apoyo a sus hijos para que asistan a la universidad.
texts.en: Rosa sells tortillas and pupusas (stuffed tortillas). She is married and has 3 children. They all live together. She runs her business from six in the morning to four in the afternoon. During the day she works in both activities. She inherited this business from her family. She will buy corn, fresh cheese, pork cracklings, tomatoes, spices, etc. She will increase her inventory in order to have better productivity. She will serve her customers better and increase her earnings. She hopes to have no difficult cancelling her debt. Her dreams are to grow her business, make improvements to her house and give support to her children so that they attend college.

loans.use: to buy corn, fresh cheeses, pork cracklings, tomatoes, spices, etc.  With it she will increase her inventory in order to have better productivity.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana, está agradecida grandemente con la institución y con los inversionistas Kiva por el apoyo brindado con el préstamo anterior, de esa manera ha mejorado su venta de ropa, sus ingresos son más estables, tiene nuevos clientes satisfechos y el nivel de vida familiar es más digno.
Se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo para comprar ropa interior, faldas, camisas, pantalones, blusas, etc., su objetivo es conservar el inventario de la venta de ropa surtido para satisfacer las demandas de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Juana is extremely grateful to Kiva and its investors flor the support provided by the previous loan. In that way she has improved her clothing shop, her income is more stable, she has new satisfied clients, and her family's standard of living is more respectable. 

She has decided for a new loan to buy undergarments, skirts, shirts, pants, blouses, etc. Her objective is to conserve the inventory of the assorted clothing shop in order to satisfy the demands of her clients.

loans.use: to buy undergarments, skirts, shirts, pants, blouses, etc. Her objective is to maintain inventory for the assorted clothing shop.

loans.name: Fellen Rose

texts.en: Fellen Rose is a 21 year old woman from Concepcion, Iloilo. She runs a small eatery or carenderia in her place. Fellen Rose has been in the business for several years now. Fellen Rose wants to expand her business but lacks the financial resources to do so. Fellen Rose is requesting to take a loan to buy ingredients like meat, vegetables,cooking oil and condiments, rice, soft drinks and others. Through this, she will be able to cook and sell more to her customers. In the future, Fellen Rose hopes of making her business more sustainable and productive.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like meat, vegetables,cooking oil and condiments, rice, soft drinks and others

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is a hardworking entrepreneur who has a general store business in the Philippines. 

She is borrowing PHP 20,000 through NWTF to buy stocks of household goods to sell like soap, milk, chips, canned goods, etc. for her general store business.

Erlinda has been in this business for four years. Erlinda earns more income from farming rice and raising pigs.

She successfully repaid her previous loan and now she has requested another loan to further build her businesses.

Erlinda has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts with the help of the loans from NWTF. She dreams of saving money to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy stocks of household goods to sell like soap, milk, chips, and canned goods

loans.name: Mary Grace

texts.en:
Mary Grace works hard to support her family. Mary Grace is married and has a buy and sell dried fish business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 10,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of dried fish to sell.

Mary Grace has been in this business for six years now.

She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of dried fish to sell

loans.name: Ofelia

texts.en:
Ofelia is widow with six children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Ofelia is 50 years old and has two children who are in school.

She has a food vending business in the Philippines. Ofelia requested a PHP 30,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Ofelia has been in this business for 20 years. In the future, Ofelia would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Alma

texts.en:
Alma is 46 years old and married with six children, two of whom are in school.

She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. Alma is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Alma has been raising pigs for 10 years and earns additional income from buying and selling fish.

She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Silvia Carolina

texts.es:
Silvia, está solicitando un crédito nuevo para poder comprar telas, botones, hilos, zippers, agujas, etc., para elaborar pedidos de prendas de vestir en esta temporada, mantendrá su puntualidad y calidad de sus trabajaos.
Con el capital anterior ha ido mejorando el inventario de la sastrería, tiene mayor popularidad en su comunidad, ha cancelado sus deudas y se siente satisfecha de estar ayudando a tener un nivel de vida familiar más digno y también ha hecho reparaciones en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Silvia is requesting a new loan in order to purchase fabric, buttons, thread, zippers, needles, etc. in order to make clothing by request for this season.  She will continue to make repayments punctually and to maintain the high quality of her work. 

With her previous loan she has been able to improve the inventory of her seamstress shop and gain greater popularity in her community.  She has paid off her loans and she feels satisfied that she is helping raise her family's quality of life, making it more dignified.  She has also been able to complete some repairs on her home.

loans.use: to purchase fabric, buttons, thread, zippers, needles, etc. in order to make clothing by request for this season.

loans.name: Yeranos

texts.en:
Yeranos is 41 years old and he lives in the village Geghanush in the Syunik region. He is not married and he lives alone now. 

He worked at different places (at the TV channel, then as a contractual serviceman, and also at the petrol station) before establishing his own business.  Now for four years already he has had his butcher’s business. 

He sells a great range of meats such as poultry, pork, beef, and mutton. The meat he buys from his villagers, whom he has known for many years and he knows that the meat they sell him is fresh and testy, so that he can lose none of his loyal customers, the number of whom is great.

Yeranos asks this loan in order to buy a great assortment of meat for sale at the New Year’s holidays, since this is the time when meat is in great demand for making various and testy dishes.

loans.use: to buy a great assortment of meat for sale at the  New Year’s holidays

loans.name: Suren

texts.en:
Suren, who lives in Kapan city in the Syunik region in the nearby village of Khedrants, runs a farming business. Suren is married and he lives with his nice wife and two school-aged daughters. Suren has been employed at different places but has been farming for many years until now at his first place. On his farm, Suren has three calves, two cows and 25 chickens. His farm products (milk, meat and eggs) are few but he manages to sell them to his regular customers. On his plot of land, he cultivates potato and greens and part of it he also sells. The other part he uses for his family.

Suren is asking for a loan of 900 US dollars in order to buy a lot of animal fodder for his farm cattle, so that during winter his cattle will have enough fodder until spring.

loans.use: to buy a lot of animal fodder for his farm cattle

loans.name: Safina

texts.en: Safina is forty-nine years old and married. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband (also shown in the photo) at the corner of her house. Her husband also assists her by purchasing stocks of goods from the market as he has maintained many contacts over the years. She is a mother of six children and is motivated to provide her family with good quality food, clothing and healthcare. She wants to grow her business so she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR  to buy packs of salt, biscuits, rice, spices and juices to handle the increasing demands of her customers efficiently and to get boost in her earnings for expanding her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salt, biscuits, rice, spices and juices

loans.name: Shehnaz

texts.en: Shehnaz is forty-five years old and married. She runs a business of milk selling with her husband. She has buffaloes and cows for milk production. Her husband sells the milk in nearby areas.  Shehnaz’s job is to look after the buffaloes and collect the milk from them. Together, both husband and wife are supporting their family. However they need to earn more income to cover their everyday expenditures. Therefore, Shehnaz has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to buy one more buffalo so that she can meet the needs of more customers and provide a better standard of living to her family members.

loans.use: to buy one more buffalo

loans.name: Samina

texts.en:
Samina is 35 years old and is a married woman. She has 6 children. She is a vigorous lady, and for the past many years, has been running a business purchasing and selling cloth. She buys cloth in various fabrics, in different colors and designs from the market at wholesale rates and then sells them to the people of her community. She has a varied customer base and is able to earn enough through her business. 

Now, she has requested for a loan of 45,000 PKR  to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs to attract more customers and expand her business. She hopes to have a good experience with this new loan. Samina  expects a boost in her earnings with the loan and she plans to spend the part of her profits on the betterment of her family members.

loans.use: to buy a wide variety of cloth in different colors and designs.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To purchase many various kinds of clothes

loans.name: Araqsya

texts.en:
The sunny woman in the photo is Araqsya. She and her nice family live in Spitak town of Shirak region. The family owns a farm which they have developed on their own. 

They keep livestock of 14 calves and 3 cows. The barn where they keep animals is too small for that number of cattle, so Araqsya would like to enlarge it. She asks this loan to renovate the barn and make it bigger. 

Your loan will be a big support for this woman and her family members: her husband, son, daughter-in-law and two grandchildren, to improve their farm and make it more profitable.

loans.use: to renovate the barn and make it bigger.

loans.name: Zhumakan

texts.ru: Жумакан, 56 лет, замужем, 5 детей. У Жумакан среднее образование, с 1995 года в качестве дополнительного дохода занимается сельским хозяйством. У нее в хозяйстве есть 3 коровы, 1 лошадь и 15 овец. На участке мерою 3,88 ГА она выращивает фасоль для реализации. Жумакан известна, как принципиальный, честный, порядочный и надежный человек. На сегодняшний день ее деятельность приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 7,000 сом (KGS). Для дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 10 овец для откорма и реализации, часть средств она потратит на покупку удобрений и ГСМ. Доходы от кредита Жумакан планирует использовать для развития своего хозяйства, чтобы в будущем накопить средства на ремонт дома.
texts.en: Zhumakan is 56 years old, married and has 5 children. Zhumakan has a secondary education and, to provide additional income, has been involved in agriculture since 1995. Her farm contains 3 cows, 1 horse and 15 sheep. She grows beans for sale on approximately 3.88 hectares of land. Zhumakan is known as an honest, decent, and reliable person with strong principles. Today, her business yields approximately 7,000 som (KGS) in monthly profit. To further develop her business, she requested a loan in the amount of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy 10 sheep for fattening up and resale, and also to buy fertilizers and fuel. Zhumakan plans to use the earnings from the loan to develop her business in order to save money and repair her house in the future.

loans.use: to buy 10 sheep for fattening up and resale, as well fertilizers and fuel for land cultivation

loans.name: Shamim

texts.en:
Shamim is a 43-year-old married woman. She is doing the work of hand embroidery. She makes beautiful patterns for the people of her community. Her designs are much in demand, and she has managed to consolidate a clientele that allows her to contribute to the expenses of her home. 

To help her to continue her operations, she has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR  to buy spools of thread in different colors, along with packs of beads, sequins, and stones for its embellishment; will allow her to cater to more customers consistently. 

She is hopeful to get an increase in her income by targeting more customers. She dreams of her bright future, and desires to build her own house.

loans.use: to buy spools of thread in different colors, along with packs of beads, sequins, and stones for its embellishment

loans.name: Anwar

texts.en:
Anwar is 55 years old, married and a very talented lady. Some years ago she started her work as a tailor in order to help in running her household. She excels in her work and has gained a lot of recognition in her community.

Anwar works hard to continually provide income for the family’s everyday expenses. She is applying for a loan of 30,000 PKR through the Kashf Foundation to buy more spools of thread, ribbons, cloth, needles and scissors to be able to make more dresses quickly and so get a boost in her earnings. She wishes to spend her profits on providing a quality life for her family members.

loans.use: to buy more spools of thread, ribbons, cloth, needles and scissors

loans.name: Huma

texts.en: Huma is 26 years old. She is a married woman.  She deals in the business of selling animals. She buys animals (baby goats and calves) at low prices, brings them up and then sells them in the market at higher prices. She makes enough through her business to contribute to the family income. She also sells milk to generate an extra amount of income. She needs to improve her business to bear her household expenses. For this reason, she contacted Kashf Foundation and applied for a loan of PKR 40,000  to purchase more animals to increase her sales. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market. With this loan, she will definitely expand her business and income level.

loans.use: to purchase more animals to increase her sales.

loans.name: Shehnaz

texts.en: Shehnaz is a 45-year-old married woman. She is a mother of five children. She has been operating a business of buying and selling animals for many years with her husband. She earns a good amount of income to contribute to her family's total income. Now, she has requested a loan of 55,000 PKR. She wants to use this loan to purchase more cattle to resell in the market. She desires to improve her standard of living through all her efforts.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle to resell

loans.name: Fatima

texts.en: Fatima is forty-seven years old, married and the mother of four children. The income generated by her husband is insufficient to cover all household expenses, so she started a business of milk sales. She has been doing this for many years and has become known for providing good quality milk in her locality. With the support of the Kashf Foundation, she has gradually improved her business. Currently she has requested for a loan of 45,000 PKR  to purchase another buffalo to increase her sales and profits, which she will use to provide her family with the basic necessities of life.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo

loans.name: Azra

texts.en: Azra  is forty-one years old and married. For many years, she has been running a milk selling business with the help of her husband, who is also shown in the photo. She has buffaloes for milking purpose. She sells the milk in her area. Her business is doing well enough to pay for her family’s expenses. She has nine children. She is a dedicated mother and wants the best for her children. She has taken many loans from Kashf Foundation and now, she has requested a loan of 45,000 PKR  to purchase one more buffalo for increasing milk sales. This will allow her to earn a good amount of income to fulfil her dream of providing better living conditions for her children.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo

loans.name: Zarina's Group

texts.en: Zarina is a thirty-six-year-old woman. She lives in Lahore, Pakistan. She is a responsible mother of four children. Her husband is a rickshaw driver by profession. He has been running an auto rickshaw for the last many years. From the past few days, his rickshaw has not been working properly, so he has not been able to generate any income. He wants to repair it as soon as possible. However due to a lack of money he finds it difficult to cover the cost of repairing the rickshaw. Therefore Zarina has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to help her husband to cover the cost of repairing his rickshaw. This will help him to continue his business. Zarina is so thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to cover the cost of repairing her husband's rickshaw.

loans.name: Azra

texts.en:
Azra is 60 years old and a married woman. The man shown in the photo is Azra ’s son, who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine. 

For this reason, Azra  has applied for a loan of 40,000 PKR, for her son. He wants  to buy new tires, along with auto spare parts and tools for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. 

Azra  is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her son, and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires along with auto spare parts and tools

loans.name: Pum's Group

texts.en: Pum’s group live in a rural village in Phnom Penh city in Cambodia. Pum makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a factory laborer to support her family. Pum has one son in her family.In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and man to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family

loans.name: Phal's Group

texts.en: Phal’s group live in a rural village in Kandal province in Cambodia. Phal makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as tailor to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for her family

loans.name: Thoeurn's Group

texts.en: Thoeurn’s group live in a rural village in Phnom Penh City in Cambodia. Thoeurn makes a living cultivating rice and he also does extra work as factory laborer to support his family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these women and men to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family

loans.name: Phally's Group

texts.en: Phally’s group live in a rural village in Phnom Penh City in Cambodia. Phally makes a living cultivating rice to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help each of these woman and man to safeguard the health of their families and save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family

loans.name: Vat's Group

texts.en: Vat’s group live in a rural village in Phnom Penh city in Cambodia.Vat makes a living cultivating rice and she also does extra work as a tailor to support her family. In their village there is no reliable access to safe, clean drinking water. Having a water filter at home will help these men and woman to safeguard the health of their families, save money on medical expenses and save time collecting fuel and boiling water.

loans.use: to buy a water filter to provide safe drinking water for their family

loans.name: Yoselin Veronica

texts.es: Yoselin tiene 21 años de edad y habita junto a su padre y su pequeño hijo de un año de edad. Ella es una joven muy trabajadora y emprendedora. Se dedica a la venta de lácteos desde hace mucho tiempo y es así como mantiene a su pequeño hijo.  Yoselin desea mejorar las condiciones del piso de su casa para que su hijo pueda moverse en condiciones más higiénicas. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, arena y grava para encementar el piso de la vivienda lo antes posible.
texts.en:
Yoselin is 21 years old and lives with her father and her small, one-year-old son. She is a hardworking, entrepreneurial young woman.

She has made a living selling dairy for a long time and this is how she supports her young son. Yoselin wants to improve the condition of her home’s floor so that her son can move around in more hygienic conditions. 

Therefore, she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in the purchase of cement, sand and gravel to create concrete floors in her house as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and gravel to cement the floor in her house

loans.name: Roberto Enrique

texts.es: Roberto tiene 29 años de edad y se dedica a la elaboración de hermosas hamacas desde hace mucho tiempo. Tiene 6 años de contar con este negocio y es así como se gana la vida y mantiene la economía de su hogar. Roberto desea invertir en su negocio dado que desea aprovechar esta temporada que es donde los clientes mayor demandan sus productos. Roberto solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en materiales como: variedad de hilos, telas, etc. para continuar elaborando las hamacas que tanto gustan a sus clientes.
texts.en: Roberto is 29 years old and works making hammocks. It is a business he has had for 6 years and through it he earns a living and supports his home. Roberto wishes to invest in his business given that he wishes to take advantage of this season when he experiences more demand for his products from customers. Roberto seeks a loan from FUSAI to buy a variety of thread, fabric, etc. in order to continue making hammocks that his customers like so much.

loans.use: to buy a variety of thread, fabric, etc. to make hammocks that his customers like.

loans.name: Cesar Alexander

texts.es: Cesar de 27 años de edad es soltero y se gana la vida con su negocio de compra y venta de artesanías la cual realiza desde hace 8 años y que le ha permitido sostener a su familia. Él habita en casa propia junto a su padre y su madre a los que apoya con los gastos de su hogar. Cesar desea comprar las artesanías por mayor ya que de esta manera obtiene mejores ganancias, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: artesanías por mayoreo y de esta manera obtener mejores ingresos que le permitan brindar mejores condiciones de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Cesar, who is 27 years old, is single and earns a living with his business of buying and selling handicrafts, which he has been doing for 8 years and which has allowed him to support his family. He lives in his own house along with his father and mother, whom he helps with household expenses. 

Cesar wants to buy handicrafts wholesale, since in this way he obtains better earnings. For this, he is applying to FUSAI for a loan to invest in handicrafts wholesale and in this way obtain better income that will allow him to offer better living conditions to his family.

loans.use: to invest in wholesale handicrafts

loans.name: Lucas

texts.es: Lucas tiene 53 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su madre. Él posee un taller de estructuras metálicas que es el que le permite llevar el sustento a su hogar y mantener la economía de su familia. Lucas ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en su taller dado que necesita más herramientas que le permitan mejorar su agilizar su trabajo y así dar a sus clientes un mejor servicio. Con el monto comprará materiales como: tenazas, hierro, grasa, aceites, electrodos, entre otros. Espera poder contar con este crédito y de esta forma mejorar su negocio.
texts.en: Lucas is 53 years old and he lives in his own home with his mother. He owns a metalworking shop which enables him to support his household and family. Lucas has made the decision to seek a loan from FUSAI to invest in his shop given that he needs more tools so that he can permanently improve his speed in his work and give his clients better services. With the loan he will buy pliers, iron, grease, oils, electrodes and other items. He hopes to be able to count on this loan and in this way improve his business.

loans.use: to buy pliers, iron, grease, oils, electrodes and other items.

loans.name: Jocelyn

texts.en:
Jocelyn is 47 years old and married with two children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 13,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like shampoo, groceries, etc. 

Jocelyn has borrowed and repaid two loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for two years and also earns additional income from motorcycle transport.

She aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like shampoo and groceries

loans.name: Cesar Oswaldo

texts.es: Cesar es un señor muy responsable, el tiene 7 hijos pero ya ninguno de ellos le acompaña, ya que son independientes, Cesar y su esposa  desde que eran muy jóvenes se dedican  a la agricultura y a la crianza de animales menores, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos ya que comenta que en su humilde casa tiene un espacio de terrenito para criarlos y al momento de venderlos obtener su ganancia, don Cesar comenta que esa es la vida de las personas del campo  y es asi como saca para sus gastos diarios.
texts.en:
Cesar is a responsible man. He has seven children who are independent, but none of them are married. Cesar and his wife have worked in agriculture and raised small animals from a very young age.

This loan will be invested in the purchase of chickens. Cesar says that he has a small plot of land at his house where he raises them. At the moment, he sells them in order to generate income. Don Cesar says this is how people in the country live and pay for their daily expenses.

loans.use: to buy chickens.

loans.name: Susanna

texts.en:
Susanna lives with her beloved husband in the village Arajadzor of the Syunik region. For  many years she worked at  different workshops and at the buffet as a cook. 

Now her only occupation is farming and agriculture in which her retired husband greatly helps. They have three sons and all of them are married and they live separately with their families. 

Susann in her farm has three cows, two heifers, two calves and two piglets. Her land is also rich with harvest such as potatoes, cucumbers, and beans, and also fruits such as apples and pears. All their farm products this nice couple sells at the city’s wholesale market during the week. 

This Kiva loan will solve a great problem for this peasant family since Susanna wants to buy a lot of animal fodder for her cattle for the long winter period.

loans.use: to buy a lot of animal fodder for her cattle for the long winter period

loans.name: Tatev

texts.en:
Tatev is young farmer from Achajur village, Tavush region, in Armenia. She is married and a mother of two children, a seven-year-old son and a four-year-old daughter.
 
Tatev’s husband is a seasonal migrant worker, but during the winter season, he helps Tatev with the farm. The latter includes cultivation of wheat, corn, haricot, potato, onion, garlic and greens. The sale of their harvest is a very important source of income for the family.

Tatev has now applied for this loan to purchase a mother pig and forage for feeding the livestock. She will be very thankful to lenders for their support and trust.

loans.use: to purchase a mother pig and forage for feeding livestock

loans.name: Aghavni

texts.en:
Aghavni is married and has a 24-year-old married child. Her husband is a teacher at a local school, and Aghavni is involved in agribusiness. She owns a commercial refrigerator where she keeps fruits for resale. Aghavni specializes in keeping and selling grapes.

She asks for this loan to cover land cultivation costs and to purchase grapes to sell.

loans.use: to cover land cultivation works and purchase grapes to store for later sales.

loans.name: Shoghik

texts.en:
Shoghik is a teacher in the local school of Areg village. She lives with her husband and four children (three daughters and one son). Shoghik’s husband regularly travels to Russia as a migrant worker to help his family financially. 

Shoghik, to sustain her family’s living, is involved in agriculture. She keeps livestock of cows, calves, sheep, piglets, and hens and also cultivates wheat and grass. The requested loan will help Shoghik to develop her farming business. She plans to purchase two calves and forage (grass and barley) for feeding the cattle.

loans.use: to purchase two calves and forage (grass and barley) for feeding her cattle

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy galvanized metal sheeting, nails, and wire to replace the walls and the roof of her house

loans.name: Mousa

texts.en:
Mousa is a 24-year-old single man from Gaza city. He lives with his family in a small simple house. He has a store selling kids clothes in the city. It has been open for the past two years. It is a very good business and the demand is very high.

Mousa took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy a new collection to resell in his clothes store. By taking this loan, Mousa will be able to increase his sales and his income.

Mousa appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy a new collection to resell at his clothes

loans.name: Roxana Jackeline

texts.es: Roxana tiene 31 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a sus dos hijos. Ella es una mujer emprendedora quien se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza por catalogo y a la venta de ropa nueva. La venta la realiza de manera ambulante desde hace mucho tiempo y es así como lleva el sustento a su hogar. Roxana desea mejorar las condiciones del piso de la vivienda por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de cemento, ladrillo de piso, arena y grava para proceder a la mejora lo antes posible.
texts.en: Roxana is 31 years old and lives in her own home with her two children. She is an enterprising woman who sells beauty products via catalog and new clothing. She is a street vendor and has had this business for a long time and this is how she supports her household. Roxana wishes to improve her home's floor so she is asking FUSAI for a loan to buy cement, brick for the floor, sand, and gravel in order to proceed as soon as possible.

loans.use: to buy cement, brick for the floor, sand, and gravel to cement the floor of her home.

loans.name: Ununio Group

texts.en: Zubeca, who is in her early 30s and single, is the mother of three children who are still in school. She has been selling clothes for three years, and works from 8am to 8pm daily to make a small monthly profit. This will be Zubeda's first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She will use this loan to buy up-to-date clothing to meet her customers' needs. She dreams of owning a big clothes shop some day, and will share this loan with her group UNUNIO, which has five members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy up-to-date clothes to meet customer demand.

loans.name: Gladys Lastenia

texts.es:
Gladys tiene 43 años de edad, es soltera, reside junto a su hermana en el distrito de Buenos Aires, provincia de Morropón, región Piura, en la costa norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila, su población se dedica a la agricultura, ganadería, comercio y transporte.

Ella se dedica a la venta de carne de cerdo y elaboración de tortas y bocaditos para toda ocasión, es conocida en la zona y cuenta con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de enseres para su negocio como materiales de cocina y de mesa, ya que cuenta con pedidos en promociones de los colegios de la zona y necesita una mayor cantidad de materiales para poder atender la demanda de estos, lo cual le permitirá captar un mayor número de clientes, mejorando sus ingresos y aumentando su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Gladys is 43 years old, single, and lives with her sister in the Buenos Aires district, which is in the Morropón province in the Piura region in the northern coast of Peru. Life in her community is quiet. Its population works in agriculture, livestock breeding, commerce, and transportation. 

She makes a living by selling pork and by making pastries and appetizers for all types of occasions. She is known in the area and has very good personal and professional references. The loan will be used to buy the essentials for her business such as cooking and dining materials, since she has orders for school graduations in the area and she needs a larger quantity of materials to meet the demand. This will allow her to gain a greater number of customers, improving her income and increasing her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy the essentials for her business, such as cooking and dining materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cement, brick, sand, a window, laminate, etc. to expand the room where she sells her products.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda is a married woman with four grown children from Dulag, Leyte. She has been engaged in farming for twenty years, growing and selling rice. Aside from that, she runs a sari-sari (variety) store, selling commodities like sugar, cooking oil, noodles, canned goods, soft drinks, and soap. 

Erlinda has requested a loan in the amount of 17,000 PHP to buy rice seedlings and fertilizers for her farm and medicines and assorted groceries for her store. This will help to bring her farming livelihood back to normal and to fill her store to attract more customers.

She dreams to expand both sources of income to be sustainable and profitable. She also hopes to set aside some savings for emergency use.

loans.use: to buy rice seedlings, fertilizers, medicines, and assorted groceries for resale in her store

loans.name: Sadorat

texts.ru:
Садорат очень жизнерадостная и трудолюбивая женщина 36 лет. Она родилась и выросла в городе Истаравшан в  семье рабочего. Она замужем и  имеет двоих детей. Садорат швея. Она получает до 500 сомони дохода от своей деятельности.  Её мужа зовут Бахром. Её муж на заработках в России.  Садорат  хорошая спокойная женщина. Её семья живет в доме, который построили сами. Её два сына учатся в школе.  
Садорат хочет взять кредит для оплаты договора обучения своих детей. Она обратилась в МДО Арванд. Садорат  заранее благодарит за поддержку и взаимопонимание!
texts.en: Sadorat is a very happy and hardworking 36-year-old woman. She was born and raised in a worker's family in the town of Istaravshan. She is married and has two children. Sadorat is seamstress. She earns up to 500 somoni from her business. Her husband's name is Bahrom. He currently works in Russia. Sadorat is a good and calm woman. Her family lives in a house that they built themselves. Her two sons attend a school. Sadorat came to MDO Arvand and wants to obtain this loan to pay for her children's tuition. Sadorat is grateful in advance for the support and understanding!

loans.use: to pay for her children's education

loans.name: Hushnuda

texts.ru:
Хушнуда молодая девушка 30 лет. Она уроженка Ганчинского района. Она замужем и имеет двоих детей. Хушнуда имеет высшее образование. Она работает в ЗАО МДО Хумо кредитным экспертом. Она образованная и целеустремленная молодая девушка. 
  Хушнуда хочет благоустроить свой дом. Но для этого ей не хватает собственных средств. Она обратилась в МДО Арванд за кредитом. Она хочет получить кредит для ремонта дома.  Хушнуда  знает что наша поддержка её  успех.  Она заранее благодарит МДО «Арванд»за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en: Hushnuda is a 30-year-old young woman. She is a native of the Gissar district. She is married and has two children. Hushnuda has a college education and works as a loan expert at MDO Humo microfinance institution. She is an educated and goal-oriented young woman. Hushnuda wants to renovate her house, but does not have enough of her own money to do so. She came to MDO Arvand for a loan. She wants to obtain this loan to repair her house. Hushnuda knows that our support leads to her success. She thanks MDO Arvand in advance for the support and trust.

loans.use: to buy building materials in order to repair her house

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es:
Juan, de 31 años de edad, estudió hasta noveno grado, está acompañado y tiene 1 hija de 4 años de edad. 

Juan, durante la mañana se dedica a moler maíz, ya que hace algunos años adquirió un molino; y en la tarde se dedica a vender pan y atol en los cantones aledaños a su residencia, para obtener un ingreso adicional y su esposa se queda de encargada de moler en la tarde y a cuidar unas novillas que poseen.

Juan, necesita el crédito para comprar  varios quintales de maíz, ya que desea iniciar en el negocio de compra y venta de granos básicos, para poder incrementar sus ingresos.

Juan, planea comprar más animales e iniciar otro negocio de producción de leche ya que desea vender productos lácteos, todo esto con el fin de asegurar el futuro de su hija y que ella pueda tener la oportunidad de estudiar lo que ella desee.
texts.en:
Juan is 31 years old and went to school through ninth grade. He lives with his 4-year-old daughter. 

During the morning, Juan spends his time grinding corn, since some years ago he acquired a mill. In the afternoon he spends his time selling bread and atol (cornflour drink) in the neighborhoods near his house, in order to make additional income. His wife stays back and is in charge of grinding in the afternoon and caring for their heifer cows. 

Juan needs a loan to buy various quintals of corn, since he wants to start in the business of buying and selling basic grains, in order to be able to increase his income.

Juan plans to buy more animals and to start another milk production business since he wants to sell dairy products, all this with the goal of securing his daughter's future and so she can have the opportunity to study what she wishes.

loans.use: to buy quintals (weight measure) of corn.

loans.name: Dilmurod

texts.ru:
Дилмурод трудолюбивый и жизнерадостный парень 34 лет. Он родился и вырос кишлаке Тукузчалак  Истаравшанского  района в семье дехканина. Он  женат и  имеет четырех  детей.   Он занимается  животноводство и земледелием. Также он работает мастером по ремонту домов, который приносит дополнительный доход в его семью.
 Животноводства приносит хороший доход, поэтому Дилмурод хочет расширить этот бизнес, увеличив поголовье своего скота. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд, чтобы получить кредит на покупку скота. Дилмурод заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Dilmurod is a hardworking and happy 34-year-old young man. He was born and raised in a dekhan farmer family in the Tukuzchalak village of the Istaravshan district. He is married and has four children. He is involved in animal husbandry and farming. He also works as a residential repairman, and this work brings in additional income to the family. Animal husbandry yields a good income, and this is why Dilmurod wants to expand this business by increasing his livestock headcount. This is why he came to Arvand to obtain a loan for buying livestock. Dilmurod thanks Arvand in advance for the support.

loans.use: to buy cattle in order to increase his livestock headcount and grow his business

loans.name: Tasleem

texts.en:
Tasleem, age 46, is a married lady. She is running a successful business selling goats to provide her family a decent life. She buys baby goats at low prices and after raising them a year or two, she sells them out in her locality. 

Currently she has availed herself for a Murabaha loan of 30,000 PKR to purchase more baby goats to increase her sales, and to fulfill her dream of providing a good education to her six children.

loans.use: to purchase more baby goats to increase her sales

loans.name: Benedicta

texts.en:
Benedicta is 33 years old, married, and has four children who are in school.

She is in the agricultural business farming rice in the Philippines. Benedicta requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional sacks of fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Benedicta has been farming rice for 20 years now, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Benedicta would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional sacks of fertilizers and other farm supplies

loans.name: Samina

texts.en:
Samina is a 33-year-old married woman and the mother of four children. The income generated by her husband is insufficient to cover all household expenses, so she initiated her business of milk sales. She has been doing it for many years, and has become famous for providing good quality milk in her locality. 

With the support of Kashf Foundation, she has gradually improved her business. Currently she has requested a loan of 45,000 PKR  to purchase another buffalo to increase her sales and earn profits for providing her family with the basic necessities of life.

loans.use: to purchase another buffalo to increase her sales and earn profits for providing her family with the basic necessities of life.

loans.name: Sadia

texts.en:
Sadia is a 34-year-old married woman who has been running a business of milk selling for many years, with the help of her husband. She has buffaloes for milking purposes. She sells the milk in her area. Her business is doing well enough to pay for her family’s expenses. She has three children. She is a dedicated mother and wants the best for her children. 

She has taken many loans from Kashf Foundation; now, she has requested a loan of 55,000 PKR  to purchase one more buffalo for increasing milk sales. 

She wants to earn a good amount of income to fulfill her dream of providing better living conditions to her children.

loans.use: to purchase one more buffalo for increasing milk sales

loans.name: Shumaila

texts.en:
Shumaila is 25 years old and a married woman. She has been in a business of beauty parlor for three years. She is known in her town for offering many facilities to her customers such as makeup, hair styling, facials, etc. Over time she has attained a regular list of customers, and makes enough to contribute in the family income. 

Now, she needs to deal with more customers, time after time. For this reason she has obtained a Murabaha loan of 35,000 PKR. It enabled her to purchase more hair care products, skin products, creams for bleaching and whitening in large quantities, along with chairs and a mirror for her parlor.

loans.use: to purchase more hair care products, skin products, creams for bleaching and whitening in large quantities, along with chairs and a mirror for her parlor.

loans.name: Mujeres En Accion Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Mujeres en acción, se formo con la intención de que cada una de las integrantes de este grupo vaya trabajando y se esfuerce por poder salir adelante, es un grupo nuevo, muy unido. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza para que ellas puedan ir mejorando día a día.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Felicita, quien tiene una despensa en la que todos los días trabaja y lucha por poder ir mejorando, comenta que está casada, y que su esposo es transportista, por medio de esto ambos se ayudan y ayudan a su familia. Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora.
La Sra. Felicita  solicita este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos varios para poder seguir con sus ventas, como ser: verduras, condimentos, carne, frutas, enlatados, bebidas y demás. Ella esta agradecida por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir creciendo en su microemprendimiento.
texts.en:
The group called "Mujeres en Acción"  (Women in Action) was formed with the goal that each one of the members of this group would continue working and exert herself to be able to get ahead. It is a new group and very united. They are doing the survey on elimination of poverty so that they can improve day by day.

One of the members is Señora Felicita, who has a store where she works every day and strives to keep improving. She comments that she is married, and her husband is a driver. Through their work, they both help each other and help their family. She is a very hard-working and determined woman. 

Señora Felicita is applying for this loan to be able to invest it in the purchase of various supplies to be able to continue with her sales, such as vegetables, condiments, meat, fruit, canned goods, beverages, and other items. She is grateful for the opportunity that she is receiving to be able to continue growing in her micro-business.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, condiments, meat, fruits, canned goods, beverages, and other items.

loans.name: Mery

texts.es:
Mery tiene 28 años de edad, es conviviente, con un hijo a su cargo, vive en casa propia en el distrito de Oyotún, provincia de Chiclayo, región Lambayeque, en la costa norte de Perú. La población del distrito se dedica a la agricultura y a la crianza y comercio de animales.

Mery se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales de corral como patos, gallina, pavos, chivos, etc. con 07 años de experiencia en el negocio. El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de animales de corral como chivos, patos, gallina, pavos. Esto le ayudará a tener una mayor variedad y productividad de animales, lo cual tendrá un gran impacto en su negocio. Mery espera cubrir el rango de gustos y necesidades de sus clientes, lo que le permitirá mejorar su ingreso, aumentar sus ganancias, con la finalidad de mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Mery is 28 years old and in a relationship. She has one child in her care. She lives in her own house in the Oyotún district, which is in the Chiclayo province in the Lambayeque in the northern coast of Peru. The people of this district work in agriculture and by raising and selling animals. 

Mery makes a living by raising and selling farm animals such as ducks, chickens, turkeys, goats, etc. She has more than 7 years of experience in this business. The loan will be used to buy farm animals such as goats, ducks, chickens, and turkeys. This will help her have a greater variety and productivity of animals, which will have a large impact on her business. Mery hopes to meet the range of preferences and needs of her customers, which will allow her to improve her income and increase her earnings, with the goal of improving her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy farm animals such as goats, ducks, chickens, and turkeys.

loans.name: La Primavera Group

texts.es:
El grupo La Primavera está en su ciclo número 13 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante, todo esto lo hacen para poder ayudar a sus familias.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Julina, que a través del esfuerzo que ella realiza y también al trabajo va creciendo en lo que hace. Ella se dedica a la confección de prendas en Ao Poi, el cual es un tejido típico paraguayo que es muy vendido.
La Sra. Juliana solicita  este préstamo para la compra de telas, hilos y otros insumos necesarios para realizar las prendas de Ao poi,   y con lo cual mejorar sus ingresos y la calidad de vida de su familia. Agradece por la oportunidad que reciben de poder crecer y salir adelante.
texts.en:
The "La Primavera" group is in its 13th cycle of the women's committee program where they all work and help each other get ahead in order to be able to help their families.

One of the members if Juliana, who through her efforts and work is growing her business. She makes clothing in the traditional "Ao Poi" style, which is a traditional Paraguayan style that is very popular. Juliana seeks this loan to buy fabric, thread and other necessary supplies to make "Ao Poi" traditional style clothing, which will improve her income and quality of life for her family. She is thankful for the opportunity to be able to grow and be successful.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread and other necessary supplies to make "Ao Poi" traditional style clothing.

loans.name: Nuevo Horizonte Group

texts.es:
El grupo Nuevo Horizonte  está en su ciclo número 20 del programa de comité de mujeres, es un grupo muy unido que con trabajo y lucha ha ido creciendo y mejorando. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde las 17 mujeres estan trabajando y luchando bastante.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. María quien se dedica a las confecciones varias, ya tiene muy buena clientela gracias a que hace muy buenas confecciones y gustan muchos a sus clientes. Es una mujer muy trabajadora y que se empeña poder poder crecer y salir adelante.
La Sra. María pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de telas, hilos, agujas, botones y demás, de manera a poder seguir con sus confecciones y cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes. Agradece por la oportunidad que ella esta recibiendo de poder crecer en su microemprendimiento.
texts.en:
Nuevo Horizonte Group is in its twentieth loan cycle with the women's bank program.  It's a very close group that has grown and improved with work and perseverance.  They're doing the "Poverty Stoplight" survey, on which the 17 women are working and striving a lot.

One of the members is María, who works making a variety of garments.  She has very good customers thanks to her good work that pleases her customers a lot.  She's a very hardworking woman who works hard to be able to grow and make progress.

María's requesting this loan to be able to buy fabric, thread, needles, buttons, and other materials to keep on making garments and fulfilling her customers' orders.

She's grateful for the opportunity she's receiving to be able to grow in her micro-entrepreneurship.

loans.use: to buy fabric, needles, buttons, and other materials

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en:
Evangeline is a business woman with 15 years experience in food vending selling homemade meals. To augment income, she also raises and sells hogs. She is asking for a loan to buy meat and vegetables and to purchase piglets and feed. These supplies will be used to make homemade meals, and she will raise the piglets and sell them as hogs in a few months. 

Evangeline is a married woman with five children. Her oldest child is 21 and youngest is 9. She lives with her family in Dulag, Leyte, and would like to  expand her businesses to provide her family with better living conditions and to support the welfare of her growing children, especially by sending them to school.

loans.use: to buy meat and vegetables for food vending and to purchase feed and piglets, which she will raise.

loans.name: Kerin Ofilio

texts.es:
Kerin, le ha gustado la experiencia de trabajar con créditos y se ha decidido por uno nuevo, que utilizara para comprar teclados, mauses, memorias, pantallas, audífonos entre otros accesorios para computadoras, así su negocio de reparación y mantenimiento de computadoras seguirá mejorando.
Utilizo el financiamiento anterior para mejorar el servicio informático y la venta de accesorios para computadoras, continúa soltero, consiguió su independencia y también ayuda a sus padres económicamente.
texts.en:
Kerin enjoyed the experience of working with loans and has decided to take out another which he will use to buy keyboards, mouses, memory, screens, speakers, and other computer accessories. His computer repair business will continue to improve.
He used his previous loan to improve his computer and computer accessory business. 
He is still single.
He has become independent and helps his parents economically.

loans.use: to buy keyboards, mouses, memory, screens, speakers and more.

loans.name: Florence's Group

texts.en:
Florence's Group is formed by 8 farmers in Kakamega South District and is being represented by Florence, who is the group leader pictured above. She is 38 years old, is married and has 4 children. Florence has been a farmer for 20 years and is often referred to as a very hardworking individual.

Florence isn’t new to One Acre Fund. She actually joined the program in 2014 and has since noticed her life has changed, especially in the sense that she has had a healthier life due to better nutrition ever since. This year, Florence will not only get fertilizer and maize seeds as part of her loan, but she will also purchase a solar light. She is very excited about this addition since now she will be able to have light during dark hours so her children can study.

Using this loan, Florence's Group will purchase a total of 2 solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of 5.5 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light as well as hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve maize harvests.

loans.name: Magruba

texts.ru: Магруба жительница района Зафарабод. Ей 38 лет. Она замужем и мать двоих детей. Ее муж находится на заработках в Российской Федерации.  У нее два сына. Сыновьям 18 и 15 лет.  Ее дети учатся в средней школе.  Магруба занимается шитьем женской одежды. Она занимается  этой деятельностью более  двух с половиной года. Ей  в этой деятельности нравится ежедневный доход, а также она обожает шить и кроить. Магруба давно хочет отремонтировать свой дом. Но так как на эту цель у нее нет достаточных финансовых средств, она решилась обратиться за кредитом. В будущем она планирует купить новую многофункциональную швейную машинку, чтобы расширить  и улучшить свою деятельность. Магруба сейчас надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Magruba is a resident of the Zafarobod district in Tajikistan.  She is 38 years old, married, and the mother of two children.  Her husband is currently in Russia, making a living as a migrant worker.   Magruba's two sons are 18 and 15 years old and attending secondary school.  Magruba herself sews women's dresses and she has been involved in this activity for more than two and a half years.  She enjoys the daily income brought by her work.  She also loves to cut and sew.  She has been dreaming about repairing her house for a long time, but she doesn't have the financial means to do so.  For this reason, she has decided to apply for a loan.  In the future, she is planning to buy a multi-function sewing machine which will allow her to expand and improve her range of work.  For the time being, she is hoping to receive your support.

loans.use: to repair her house in order to improve her living conditions.

loans.name: Solar Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Solar  forma parte del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, a través del cual cada una de las miembros podrá conocer su situación de vida, y conforme a ello poder trabajar por salir adelante.
Lidia forma parte de este grupo, ella en su encuesta mostro un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel dos, es decir que esta en un novel medio de pobreza, que está mejorando por medio de su trabajo en la costura que viene haciendo. Ella es una persona muy sacrificada que quiere ir mejorando, es por eso que no teme a ningún desafío.
La Sra. Solicita de este préstamo para la compra de telas, agujas, hilos, entre otros, lo que le ayudará a concretar su plan de negocio, el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
The group "Solar" is part of the Poverty Elimination Program, through which each member can get to know her living situation, and then work accordingly to get ahead.

Lidia is a member of this group. Her survey results indicated a poverty level within level two, which reflects a middle level of poverty, and she is improving on it through her sewing work.

She is a selfless person who wants to keep doing better, and that is why she fears no challenge.

Lidia is requesting this loan to buy fabric, needles and thread, among other supplies. This will allow her to implement her business plan, therefore helping her to improve her income.

loans.use: to buy fabric, needles and thread, among other supplies.

loans.name: Simeon

texts.en:
Simeon owns and operates a vulcanizing shop. He is a 44-year-old married man with nine children from Dulag, Leyte.  His oldest child is 22 and the youngest is 5. To augment his income, he also runs a sari-sari (variety) store, selling various items like canned goods, biscuits, sugar, powdered milk, soap, shampoo and beverages.

Simeon is asking for a loan to buy a compressor for the shop and stocks for the store like rice, tuba (coconut) wine, toiletries and soft drinks. These will be used to attract more locals to shop and make purchases in his store. With these items, Simeon could start to operate his business again and could provide healthy foods to his whole family.

In the future, Simeon hopes to make his business more sustainable, productive and to continue to support the schooling of his children as well.

loans.use: to buy a compressor for the shop and stocks for the store including rice, tuba (coconut) wine, toiletries and soft drinks.

loans.name: Martha Lorena Group

texts.es: Martha Lorena es un grupo solidario integrado por tres mujeres que se esfuerzan por mejorar las condiciones de vida de sus familias, lo coordina Patricia de 44 años de edad, casada, su negocio es la comercialización de sandalias en comunidades cercanas a su domicilio, tiene seis años de experiencia en este negocio y es el quinto ciclo que ADIM le brinda el financiamiento para su negocio, y este último lo solicita para la compra de sandalias de tacón fino, sandalias de plataforma, sandalias bajas, etc., con los créditos anteriores ha logrado mantener y diversificar los productos ofrecidos. El resto de las integrantes son las señoras, Marta quien tiene la edad de 55 años y se dedica a la hecha y venta de cosa de horno desde hace veinte años, y Claudia de 31 años de edad comerciante de ropa nueva en su comunidad desde hace tres años.
texts.en:
Martha Lorena is a solidarity group made up of three women who are working to improve the life conditions of their families. 

Patricia is the coordinator. She is 44 years old and married. Her business is the sale of sandals in communities near her home. She has six years of experience in this business, and this is the fifth cycle for which ADIM has provided the financing for her business. 

She is requesting this latest one to buy stiletto-heeled sandals, platform sandals, flat sandals, etc. With the earlier loans she has managed to maintain and diversify the products she offers. 

The rest of the group members are the ladies: Marta who is 55 years old and has made a living baking and selling cosa de horno (corn cake) for 20 years, and Claudia who is 31 years old and has been selling new clothing in her community for three years.

loans.use: to buy sandals, which will allow her to increase her work resources and improve her income.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is a resident in the town of Dulag, Leyte. She is a 36-year-old married woman with three dependents aged 17,11, and 3. Her husband is a carpenter.

She toils the land and grows rice. To improve her income, she also grows and sells hogs, which she has done for a year. Gemma has requested a loan in the amount of 20,000 PHP to purchase farm supplies like fertilizers, rice seedlings, and pesticide.  With these, her farm will improve its yield, causing her to augment her income and provide her family with nutritious diets.

She has determined that she will handle both businesses properly to support the needs of her growing children.

loans.use: to purchase farm supplies like fertilizers, rice seedlings, and pesticide

loans.name: Aghunik

texts.en:
Aghunik is an experienced farmer from Urasar village, Lori region. She lives with her husband and two children, an 18-year-old daughter and a twelve-year-old son.

Aghunik and her husband are occupied in agriculture. They own a tractor, which they provide as a rental to other villagers. They also keep cows, calves, pigs and hens, as well as cultivate wheat and potatoes. To sustain her farm and make improvements on it, Aghunik has applied for this loan. She asks lenders to support her with funding to purchase two cows and forage for feeding the livestock.

loans.use: to pay for two cows and forage for feeding the livestock.

loans.name: Gladys María

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Nuestra Señora De la Luz se reúne cada 15 días en la ciudad de Manta,  ciudad conocida por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas en toda época del año y por ser una ciudad con una belleza sin igual con muchos atractivos turísticos.
En este lugar vive la señora Gladys, tiene 72 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión  libre y de esta relación tiene diez hijos mayores  de edad, una de ellos aun viven con ellos. Su esposo es comerciante.
Doña Gladys es una mujer que le gusta valerse por sí misma para salir adelante, ella  junto a sus esposo tienen una tienda de víveres en su casa, allí vende productos   como arroz, azúcar, aceites, detergentes, frutas y legumbres carnes, pescado, confitería  cosas de bazar y muchos otros productos para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes,  aquí sus clientes consiguen de todo por eso es que su clientela aumenta cada día más,  trabajan todos los días desde las 06h00 hasta las 20h00 y a veces hasta más tarde, llevan más de 30 años con su tienda, negocio  con la cual se ganan la vida.
Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su tienda, va a comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, detergentes, entre otros productos. Esta desde el inicio en el  Grupo de Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos. Sus sueños son tener buena salud.
texts.en:
The Nuestra Señora de la Luz communal bank meets every 15 days in the city of Manta.  The city is known for its beautiful beaches that are visited all year and for being an incomparably beautiful city with many tourist attractions.

This is where Gladys, age 72, lives.  She is in a common-law marriage, and they have ten grown children.  One of them still lives with them.  Her husband is a merchant.

Gladys is a woman who likes to make her own way.  She and her husband have a store selling provisions at their house.  She sells products like rice, sugar, cooking oils, detergent, fruit and vegetables, meat, fish, sweets, variety items, and many other products that meet her customers’ needs.  Her customers can get everything at her store.  That is why her clientele increases more every day.  They work every day from 6:00 a.m. until 8:00 p.m., and sometimes they work later.  They have had the store for over 30 years.  The business is how they earn a living.

She will use this loan to stock her store more.  She will buy rice, sugar, cooking oil, and detergent, among other products.  She has been in the communal bank since it started.  She likes it because of the help provided with the loans.  Her dream is to be in good health.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, cooking oil, and detergent, among other products.

loans.name: Geoffrey

texts.en:
Geoffrey is a married man. He has three children. He describes himself to be enterprising. He operates a transport business where he transports customers using his motorcycle. He has been involved in this business for five years. He describes his biggest business challenge to be inadequate finances.

He will use the KES 30,000 loan to buy bicycles for transport services. His business goal is to own a tuk-tuk within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will expand business and own a fleet of tuk-tuks.

loans.use: to buy bicycles for transport services

loans.name: Charles

texts.en:
Charles is 28 years old. He is married with one child who is four years old and does not yet go to school. He is a farmer and has been farming for seven years. With the loan from Kiva, he would like to buy more fertilizer to grow maize. He will sell his maize harvest at a local market. The profits from the business will be used to buy food for home consumption.

The agriculture sector accounts for 37% of Rwanda's gross domestic product, generates 65% of Rwanda's export revenue, and employs approximately 90% of Rwandans (as of 2009). Despite the importance of agriculture to Rwandans and their economy, financial institutions view lending to fund agricultural activities as a high-risk proposition because the profitability of these activities is affected by weather, natural disasters, and price fluctuations. For this reason, farmers in Rwanda remain underserved by financial institutions. Urwego Opportunity Bank is expanding into this market and is happy to provide Kiva lenders with the opportunity to support Rwandan farmers.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers to grow maize

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials for his house construction.

loans.name: Matilde Rosibel

texts.es:
Matilde, invirtió el préstamo anterior en dar mantenimiento al mollino nixtamal y comprar granos básicos para ampliar el negocio, los beneficios que hoy tiene son mejor alimentación para su familia, cancelación de su deuda y clientes satisfechos.
Está optando por un nuevo crédito para comprar fajas, grasa, discos, tolvas, maíz, frijoles y maicillo, serán de ayuda para continuar trabajando y salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Matilde used the previous loan to perform maintenance on her corn mill and to buy basic grains to expand the business.  The benefits that she now has are better food for her family, repayment of her debt, and satisfied customers.

She is electing to have a new loan to buy belts, grease, discs, hoppers, corn, beans, and sorghum.  They will help her to continue working and to get ahead with her family.

loans.use: to buy belts, grease, discs, hoppers, corn, beans, and sorghum.

loans.name: Elmira

texts.ru: Элмира, 33 года, замужем, мать 3 детей. Элмира имеет высшее образование, она социальный работник. Также с 2008 года занимается сельским хозяйством и имеет хороший опыт. Начав этот бизнес с суммы в 10,000 сом (KGS), благодаря упорному труду, Элмира смогла развить хозяйство с ежемесячной прибылью в сумме 25,000 сом (KGS). Сейчас в хозяйстве Элмиры имеется 5 коров. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) для покупки 5 бычков для откорма и последующей перепродажи.Доходы от кредита Элмира планирует вложить в дальнейшее развитие своего хозяйства и образование ее детей.
texts.en: Elmira is 33 years old, married and a mother of 3 children. Elmira has a college education and is a social worker. She has also been involved in agriculture since 2008 and has a good experience in this field. Having started this business with 10,000 som (KGS), thanks to her hard work, Elmira was able to grow her business to have a monthly profit of 25,000 som (KGS). Now Elmira's farm contains 5 cows. In order to further develop her business, she requested a loan in the amount of 150,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum" Bank to buy 5 bulls for fattening up and subsequent resale. Elmira plans to invest the earnings from the loan into further developing her business and educating her children.

loans.use: to buy 5 bulls for fattening up and subsequent resale

loans.name: Denis

texts.en:
Dennis has been a client of UGAFODE for over three years. He has applied for a loan of 3,000,000 UGX. He is 41 years old and is a single father. His two children are 18 and 16 years old respectively and are both in school. He has no dependents.

Dennis is hardworking. He is a farmer of maize and beans and also trades in local brews (enguri) to supplement the income from agriculture. He works eight hours a day. His stall of local brew is in Mirambi, Rubirizi District, alongside the road. He started these businesses to raise money to support his family economically.

Dennis says he will use the funds from this loan to buy more local brews to get more after-sale profits. He said he sells to people at the landing site and in towns in Kasese and Bushenyi Districts. The main challenge he faces in his business is poor transport means and price fluctuations. His dream is to buy a motorcycle to ease his transport means.

loans.use: to buy stock of local brew

loans.name: Naseem

texts.en: Naseem is a 37-year-old married woman and a mother of two children. In order to support her husband in taking care of the family, she began the business of milk selling.
